"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"There are countless questions about \\\"until when the great many of the pre-seed and seed round's Luna Tokens will be released?\\\" from small investors in korea and this becomes the FUD about price drop (caused by the dumping of the pre-seed and seed round investors, which will not happen) continues to spread over the time, causing existing cryptocurrency traders to continue to be reluctant to enter.\\nIf all pre-seed and seed round's Luna tokens are released at once and show there is no drop in price and the staking of Luna Tokens by pre-seed, seed investors continues, as has been the case with the ATOM, small holders and small traders are expected to continue to believe in the Terra Project and continue to stake, hold their Luna Tokens and even want to buy more, which would lead proper value of Luna Tokens.\\n\\nOr if many of investors really just want to sell their tokens, not interested in what Terra has done, it would be better to allow them to sell early and let them go away from Terra Project, and give chances to small investors to buy Luna cheaper, not with concern about dumping but with a fresh start.\",\"title\":\"Unlocking the pre-seed, seed round's Luna Tokens at once.\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2020-01-21T17:50:30.267Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"7280477051\",\"no\":\"55813322761049\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"13888075084069\"},\"proposal_id\":\"2\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2020-01-07T17:50:30.267Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512000001\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2020-01-24T23:46:08.513Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2020-01-10T23:46:08.513Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"  The circulating supply of LUNA has always been a mystery in the Terra community. Coinmarketcap and Coingecko did their own calculation, but the figure differed from 189million to 287 million. And people from the community said the actual circulating supply was around 70million. \\n  An official report of the circulating supply can increase the transparency of information disclosure. In additon, the exaggerated market cap could be a major reason that prevented people from investing LUNA. If the actualy circulating supply is different from those released by coinmarketcap and coingecko, I hope the team can talk to these two platforms and modify this mistake.\",\"title\":\"Explicit disclosure of the circulating supply of LUNA\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2020-01-25T05:08:03.810Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"14759543829339\",\"no\":\"44395896699894\",\"no_with_veto\":\"5117483304085\",\"yes\":\"6366306915704\"},\"proposal_id\":\"3\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2020-01-11T05:08:03.810Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"513000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2020-01-25T05:08:30.272Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2020-01-11T05:08:30.272Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Option to sort validators by self-delegation percentage in the staking section of Terra Station.\\n\\nThe percentage of Luna that a validator is prepared to self-delegate shows how much she is prepared to risk on her own operation and is an important signal for delegators choosing validators.\",\"title\":\"Sort validators by self-delegation (skin in the game)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2020-02-26T19:49:27.376Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"7399166751797\",\"no\":\"10617559227986\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"23616900292983\"},\"proposal_id\":\"5\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2020-02-12T19:49:27.376Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2020-03-03T06:48:04.451Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2020-02-18T06:48:04.451Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.CommunityPoolSpendProposal\",\"amount\":[{\"amount\":\"138800000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"description\":\"Chai is a payments application that works in close proximity with Terra. After its launch in June of 2019, it has seen tremendous growth by partnering with major commerce players in Korea such as TMON (general e-Commerce), Yanolja (hospitality and leisure), and CU (#1 convenience store with over 14000 stores across Korea). Some key metrics for the project are as follows: 1M+ users accumulated in less than a year, $400M in expected annual transactions (run-rate), integrations with 12+ major commerce players in Korea with many more to come. Chai's transaction volumes are reflected on the Terra blockchain, meaning that The transaction volumes of the Chai payment application are correlated with Terra transaction volumes.\\nChai utilizes seigniorage-funded discounts to offer deals for customers who choose Chai at merchant checkout. This creates a virtuous cycle where (1) users select Chai at a merchant's checkout page (2) Chai/Terra tx volume increases which in turn increases Terra money supply (seigniorage creation) (3) seigniorage is allocated to Chai which then uses it as a budget for providing promotion discounts (4) Users are incentivized to use Chai at checkout due to seigniorage-driven promotional schemes.\\nGiven the scale of current Chai transaction volumes, its potential to capture even more volume through continued business growth, and its clear value proposition for both the Terra ecosystem and users shoppping for everyday goods and services, it is our firm belief that Chai provides the highest ROI for seigniorage spent at this juncture.\",\"recipient\":\"terra1cjsf3lf8ryyj7jrraythrjkzy6y27graqvw8x9\",\"title\":\"Seigniorage Allocation to Chai\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2020-04-01T07:09:58.463Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5221812926529\",\"no\":\"8411516415637\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"99368236560622\"},\"proposal_id\":\"6\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2020-03-18T07:09:58.463Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2020-04-01T07:09:58.463Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2020-03-18T07:09:58.463Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"With the launch of Terra Blockchain, Luna held by the foundation was initially delegated to stabilize the network.\\nCurrently, the Foundation delegates more than 40% of the total delegated volume across the network.\\nAbout 260 million Luna have been delegated to the entire network and 113 million Luna from the foundation.\\nThe foundation's delegation to Luna was initially initiated to network stabilization and encourage small validators.\\nHowever, the network has already been stabilized sufficiently, and a lot of people need to increase the number of Rewards to hold Luna.\\nTherefore, suggest that the foundation either cancels Luna, which is delegated to a large validator, or that the validators managed by foundations such as Goliath and Marine be distributed to investors like the Santa program to induce Luna to hold.\\nWith this proposal, hope that the Terra block chain will grow further with the stabilization of the network we want and the increase in investor profits.\\n\\nThank you very much!\",\"title\":\"Proposal to Exclude Luna delegated by the Foundation\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2020-06-03T12:36:04.714Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"4127961166114\",\"no\":\"5046651803154\",\"no_with_veto\":\"7418394989018\",\"yes\":\"6705061641019\"},\"proposal_id\":\"9\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2020-05-20T12:36:04.714Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2020-06-03T12:42:13.965Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2020-05-20T12:42:13.965Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Terra Core is software that all nodes and validators should run in order to participate in Terra’s network. Terraform Labs has upgraded Terra Core to Columbus-3 on December 2019, which included a number of changes.\\n\\nThis proposal aims to upgrade Terra Core to Columbus-4, the next key evolution of the protocol. The three key objectives of this proposal is to:\\n\\n1. Give a high level overview of the Columbus-4 update to Terra’s users, developers and validators\\n2. Create an on-chain governance proposal to initiate a chain upgrade from Columbus-3 to Columbus-4\\n3. Create an open discussion regarding key changes of Columbus-4\\n\\nForum Link: https://agora.terra.money/t/col-4-upgrade-governance-proposal/246\",\"title\":\"Columbus-4 Upgrade Governance Proposal\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2020-09-16T09:21:02.837Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"0\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"248618351576625\"},\"proposal_id\":\"13\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2020-09-02T09:21:02.837Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2020-09-16T09:21:02.837Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2020-09-02T09:21:02.837Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Hello fellow Terrans,\\n\\nOur sincere gratitude to those who promptly responded and provided insight to submit our request via Governance on Terra Station.\\n\\nAs we notified in various channels, a mistake was occurred from a GOPAX hot wallet regarding a certain transaction on Oct. 9th - A withdrawal of 1,009,591,115.598182 KRT was made with an unsensible gas fee of 1,648,104,318.072084 KRT for that specific transaction.\\n\\nAgain, we would like to urge all validators to return the mistakenly set and distributed gas fee at your earliest convenience.\\n\\nThe PDF attached shows the amount of each validator with the falsely sent out rewards.\\n\\nPDF Link: https://www.gopax.co.kr/TerraValidators.pdf\\n\\nThe address of which to return the KRT to is:\\n\\nAddress: terra1dvghtnsqr6eusxxhqcmuhwmpw26rze8kgap823\\n\\nMemo ID: return\\n\\nAgain, our utmost and sincere apologies for the inconvenience and thank you for your cooperation.\\n\\nGOPAX\",\"title\":\"Block 72474 Gas Fee\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2020-10-27T08:35:12.332Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"43125560006659\",\"no\":\"10377858688866\",\"no_with_veto\":\"27898209511791\",\"yes\":\"2897725135440\"},\"proposal_id\":\"14\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2020-10-13T08:35:12.332Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2020-10-27T08:35:12.332Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2020-10-13T08:35:12.332Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Following the passages of Propopsals 22  and 26 to add more stable coins, adding the fiat currencies of the largest population Southeast Asian countries may help greater adoption.\\n\\nIn addition, at least for the Philippines - the country has one of the leading cryptocurrency adotpion rates in the world (https://www.statista.com/chart/18345/crypto-currency-adoption/) and also has one of the highest remittances as a percentage of GDP in the world (https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/BX.TRF.PWKR.DT.GD.ZS?most_recent_value_desc=true).\",\"title\":\"Add Terra {IDR, PHP} stablecoins\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2021-03-05T14:09:08.777Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"16207787338840\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"107947621902363\"},\"proposal_id\":\"37\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2021-02-19T14:09:08.777Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"553000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2021-03-07T08:37:32.962Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2021-02-21T08:37:32.962Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.params.v1beta1.ParameterChangeProposal\",\"changes\":[{\"key\":\"whitelist\",\"subspace\":\"oracle\",\"value\":\"[{\\\"name\\\":\\\"ukrw\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"usdr\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"uusd\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"umnt\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.020000000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"ueur\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"ucny\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"ujpy\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"ugbp\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"uinr\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"ucad\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"uchf\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"uhkd\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"usgd\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"uaud\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.003500000000000000\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"uthb\\\",\\\"tobin_tax\\\":\\\"0.007500000000000000\\\"}]\"}],\"description\":\"Author: Tanwa Arpornthip\\n- BLOCK research team, Prince of Songkla University, Phuket campus\\n- Co-founder of Sabai (We run the StakeSabai Terra node.)\\n\\nI'm proposing to add TerraTHB stablecoin. \\n\\nCrypto communities in Thailand have been excited about Terra and projects on Terra (Mirror, especially).\\n\\nTHB is also #15 by marketcap on https://fiatmarketcap.com/. This is only two spots below CHF and four spots above SGD. Both CHF and SGD are already on Terra.\\n\\nIf TerraTHB is added, Thai users will receive the following benefits:\\n- An access to a decentralized, THB stablecoin\\n- Ability to include THB into a risk-diversified investment portfolio with other fiat currencies\\n\\nNon-Thai users will receive the following benefits:\\n- An exposure to a strong currency. THB has been making a strong gain against most currencies in the last 5 years. https://www.tradingview.com/x/EDyG9sWG/\\n- A potential exposure to a developing-country’s economy in SEA. While SGD is already on Terra, but SG is a developed country. An exposure to Thai economy could help diversify investment in this region.\\n- Another FX currency to trade on Terra.\\n\\nProposal details: https://agora.terra.money/t/tip24-adding-terrathb-stablecoin/347\",\"title\":\"Adding TerraTHB stablecoin\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2021-03-08T08:19:12.030Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"2077264147\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"168891476161403\"},\"proposal_id\":\"38\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2021-02-22T08:19:12.030Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"1098880000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2021-03-08T08:19:12.030Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2021-02-22T08:19:12.030Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.CommunityPoolSpendProposal\",\"amount\":[{\"amount\":\"67705718000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"description\":\"In March, we voted on a proposal to “burn all seigniorage.” One of the key promises in this proposal was that we would have “regular proposals to burn proceeds (funds in the community pool).” There haven’t, however, been any further burns… Until now.\\n\\nThere is over 68 million LUNA in the community pool, which translates roughly into $1B UST and ~6% of total LUNA. Do has mentioned the idea of using this LUNA to bootstrap Ozone; however, he has also admitted that Ozone will be fine (even without the bootstrap) and that this decision is ultimately up to the community.\\n\\nThis proposal: https://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-to-burn-the-community-pool/1006\\n\\nPassed original proposal: https://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-to-burn-all-seigniorage/438/52\",\"recipient\":\"terra1qqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqq486l9a\",\"title\":\"Burn all funds in the Community Pool\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2021-05-26T00:15:24.410Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"1102992554431\",\"no\":\"200212005715497\",\"no_with_veto\":\"1214318260573\",\"yes\":\"8666714354120\"},\"proposal_id\":\"82\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2021-05-12T00:15:24.410Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2021-06-03T10:26:09.602Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2021-05-20T10:26:09.602Z\"}"

Based on the previous proposal to Mercurial, we are requesting ~$170,000 in LUNA, which at current price of $11.50/LUNA is approx. 15,000 LUNA.\\n\\nFurther details provided at https://agora.terra.money/t/bringing-terra-stablecoins-to-solana-pt-2-and-beyond/1691\",\"recipient\":\"terra1579wwyvp756xvz9kneds77ma0kcfcj6pf8xw7y\",\"title\":\"Bringing Terra stablecoins to Solana pt. 2 (and beyond)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2021-08-16T03:43:38.779Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"12444850392\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"256968222189566\"},\"proposal_id\":\"115\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2021-08-02T03:43:38.779Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2021-08-16T03:43:38.779Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2021-08-02T03:43:38.779Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.CommunityPoolSpendProposal\",\"amount\":[{\"amount\":\"300000000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"description\":\"Goals and Impacts\\n- Create a high-velocity pool of capital to take advantage of opportunities within Terra.\\n- Establish 3rd parties to verify quality and keep initiatives accountable to high-leverage use of community resources.\\n- Increase overall metabolism and rate of innovation within the Terra Ecosystem.\\n\\nRapid grants will be deployed to accelerate teams the Terra Ecosystem Committees believed to be essential to ecosystem development and the overall health of the Terra ecosystem. Thus, we will move fast to secure opportunities within the ecosystem.\\n\\n- Rapid Grants pool fund to be seeded with an initial 300K LUNA to provide funding for teams that would benefit the ecosystem via rapid funding. For example, upcoming hackathons/sponsorships, and teams that the Committee would like to expose to the Terra Ecosystem heavily.\\n- The initial funding will be for Q3 and Q4 of 2021 encompassing August 1 (or whenever proposal passes, whatever happenss earlier) to December 31st, 2021.\\n- In this format, funding decisions are to be made within 72 hours of the formal submission of a proposal. This is opposed to the potential 4-week period of a proposal review by TFL as well as the two-week on-chain vote period, which provides flexibility for teams to maintain high shipping velocity. Teams will still be required to submit all necessary proposals and milestone documentation. All funding will be auditable on-chain. However, select teams will be eligible for distribution via a rapid grant.\\n- The Terra Ecosystem Committee will vote on all Rapid Grants and a simple majority will be needed to approve a Rapid Grant. Rapid Grants are to be recorded in public via the public Terra Ecosystem page for community records.\\n- Rapid Grants bypass the on-chain vote and instead delegates authority to internal TFL members to issue grants.\\n- The Rapid Grants pool will also be used to fund expenses related to the program including Hackathon development, sponsorships, and other community initiatives (CosmWasm course development, etc), creation of podcasts, institutional reports, conferences, etc. to increase overall developer supply.\\n\\nProposed Initial Terra Ecosystem Committee\\nTFL Leader - @0xwagmi, Ecosystem Lead, Terraform labs\\nTFL Leader - Stanford Liu, Research, Terraform labs\\nCommunity Leader - @treehugger\\nCommunity Leader - @SebNondzee\\nPartner Protocol Leader - @tansawit, Band Protocol\\nEcosystem Fund Leader - Ninor Mansor, Arrington XRP Capital\\nEcosystem Tech Leader- @Larry0x, Delphi Digital\\n\\n\\nProposal Discussion: https://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-tfl-communitypool-spend-rapid-grants-to-accelerate-ecosystem-development-with-committee-oversight/1714/10\",\"recipient\":\"terra1jgqcsxl04sket0wfp2s0equ24wlegwtwmfqxgt\",\"title\":\"Rapid Grants to Accelerate Ecosystem Development with Committee Oversight\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2021-08-18T02:44:34.975Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"2984643334900\",\"no\":\"1726856994632\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"224545702025157\"},\"proposal_id\":\"116\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2021-08-04T02:44:34.975Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2021-08-18T02:44:34.975Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2021-08-04T02:44:34.975Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Process for future community pool spends.\\n\\nCommunity Pool Grants are designed to allow teams to make proper use of our community pool by setting actionable milestones to be audited by both the community and Terra Ecosystem Committee members. Through this process, we aim to support teams in developing and adhering to actionable milestones that deliver value to the Terra ecosystem.\\n\\nGrant Sizes\\n- $1k to $30k - grant size for teams that are developing within the Terra Ecosystem that have a new concept they are attempting to work on. All teams that have never received community pool funds will be defaulted into this grant size unless all team members have previously (1) accepted funds from the Community Pool and (2) successfully implemented all milestones with success.\\n- $30k to $100k - only available as follow-on funding to teams that have met initial milestones and have previously successfully executed on a smaller grant size.\\n\\nSpecial grants mechanisms reserved to allow for TFL sponsored special projects to be capitalized with community fund resources. For example, stablecoin distribution initiatives initiated by TFL employees: https://agora.terra.money/t/bringing-terra-stablecoins-to-solana/1537/22 2\\n\\nCommunity discussion: https://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-tfl-textproposal-establishment-of-communitypoolspend-committees-and-establishing-proposal-guidelines/1710/12\",\"title\":\"Establishment of CommunityPoolSpend Committees and Establishing Proposal Guidelines\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2021-08-18T02:50:08.229Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"186777509496\",\"no\":\"1026454615\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"233927937003853\"},\"proposal_id\":\"117\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2021-08-04T02:50:08.229Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2021-08-18T02:50:08.229Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2021-08-04T02:50:08.229Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Terra Core is software that all nodes and validators should run in order to participate in Terra’s network. It will be the most important upgrade on the Terra blockchain to date. \\nThe three key objectives of this proposal is to:\\n1) Burn all Seigniorage\\n2) Upgrade to Stargate\\n3) Integration of Ozone and Wormhole\",\"title\":\"Columbus-5 Upgrade Governance Proposal\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2021-08-25T05:30:45.258Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"74857706217561\",\"no\":\"13505245351107\",\"no_with_veto\":\"743210909525\",\"yes\":\"79841078399852\"},\"proposal_id\":\"118\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2021-08-11T05:30:45.258Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"1005274417\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2021-08-25T06:16:35.840Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2021-08-11T06:16:35.840Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Fantasy Investar is an NFT based fantasy sports platform utilizing Anchor Protocol to generate UST prize pools, allowing users to invest, compete and earn. This will enable sports fans to become true sports investors, with the aim to bring the next generation of users into the Terra ecosystem, driving demand for UST. \\n\\nAgora: https://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-funding-for-fantasy-investar/1739\\n\\nThis proposal has been reviewed and supported by the newly formed Community Pool Spend Committee.\\n\",\"title\":\"Proposal: Funding for Fantasy Investar\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2021-08-29T10:56:41.215Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"82828580540608\",\"no\":\"9223588505938\",\"no_with_veto\":\"64751258347\",\"yes\":\"98973733830323\"},\"proposal_id\":\"121\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2021-08-15T10:56:41.215Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512002560\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2021-08-29T12:19:24.105Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2021-08-15T12:19:24.105Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"This is a fundraising proposal to boost the adoption of Terra by initiating launch pools for wrapped Luna on biswap. This proposal suggests $100k+ in USDT be allocated to a launchpool.\\n\\nhttps://biswap.org is a Binance Smart Chain Dex with $450mill+ Total Value Locked.\\n\\nbiswap provides opportunities for projects to get global exposure to its 100k+ users by offering launch pools.\\nThe launch pools have to flavors.\\n1.) biswap rewards token holders can stake BSW to automatically buy wrapped tokens from various chains. Currently pools allow staking of BSW and production of ETH, Link, ADA, DOT, and other tokens like AXS. This proposal is for the creation of a new pool to generate wrapped Luna from BSW.\\n2.) wrapped token holders can stake wrapped tokens and automatically buy up BSW (the biswap rewards token). This proposal includes the creation of a wrapped Luna staking pool to generate BSW.\\n\\nApplication for biswap pools is done via form submission on the site. A representative from a crypto project submits the form.\\n\\nThe final question is how much is going to be spend in USDT for the launchpool. This proposal suggests at least $100k+ USDT\",\"title\":\"Raise $100k+ for Biswap Launch Pools for Luna\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2021-09-25T16:15:51.721Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6728570646961\",\"no\":\"96122586580570\",\"no_with_veto\":\"2486608958684\",\"yes\":\"543813461423\"},\"proposal_id\":\"124\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2021-09-11T16:15:51.721Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2021-09-25T22:05:38.284Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2021-09-11T22:05:38.284Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.CommunityPoolSpendProposal\",\"amount\":[{\"amount\":\"57500000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"description\":\"The vision behind TeFi Alpha is to unite the Terra Ecosystem and to embolden our builders, innovators, and community leaders, to create the next generation of reality-breaking technologies on the Terra Blockchain.\\n\\nIn a world that is growing ever-more centralized, it is imperative that we continue to provide our ecosystem with in-person opportunities to meet, collaborate, and cross-pollinate.\\n\\nThe prevailing concept of the event is that it is the premier space for projects to “drop alpha”, meaning the biggest announcements and unveilings they have.\\n\\nFor more information and contribute to the discussion, please us the link below.\\n\\nAgora Post: https://agora.terra.money/t/community-grant-proposal-to-expand-tefi-alpha-worldwide/2585\",\"recipient\":\"terra1psxzsx8w2yuxnwcdrsxtm532ewez0rsjk3kl6d\",\"title\":\"Community Grant Proposal to Expand ‘TeFi Alpha’ Worldwide\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2021-11-15T15:36:55.559Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"11587415243687\",\"no\":\"15941722336166\",\"no_with_veto\":\"19370950295\",\"yes\":\"152925697809317\"},\"proposal_id\":\"135\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2021-11-01T15:36:55.559Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"512000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2021-11-15T15:41:24.486Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2021-11-01T15:41:24.486Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.CommunityPoolSpendProposal\",\"amount\":[{\"amount\":\"1052000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"description\":\"AuraStake is excited to help spread the word about $UST and $LUNA, and as part of our validator work, we now have an opportunity to onboard potential clients into the ecosystem.\\n\\nWe are seeking a one-time marketing spend, up to 1,052 LUNA (~$42k at $40 / LUNA) to help bolster general awareness of and support for this ecosystem. The actual amount shall be disbursed only upon the requisite condition being met i.e., having $LUNA locked in a BSC wallet for a 30-day period. The marketing spend shall be paid immediately into the validator wallet at the end of the 30 days.\\n\\nThe marketing spend will be calculated as follows:\\n\\nRewards to Clients + AuraStake Expenses; where\\n\\nRewards to Clients = Total LUNA staked * 5% * 30/365\\nAuraStake Expenses = Rewards to Clients * 1% + 14 LUNA\\n\\nFor more information or to contribute further to the discussion, please use the link below:\\n\\nhttps://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-funding-for-user-outreach-and-onboarding/2568\\n\",\"recipient\":\"terra1rjmzlljxwu2qh6g2sm9uldmtg0kj4qgyy27m6x\",\"title\":\"Community Grant Proposal for User Outreach and Onboarding to Terra\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2021-12-05T16:16:52.161Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"41326996697047\",\"no\":\"100465117659794\",\"no_with_veto\":\"38425125193\",\"yes\":\"2627604987668\"},\"proposal_id\":\"145\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2021-11-21T16:16:52.161Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2021-11-28T16:16:52.161Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2021-11-21T16:16:52.161Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.CommunityPoolSpendProposal\",\"amount\":[{\"amount\":\"22350000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"description\":\"Our vision and community proposal is to establish an annual, not-for-profit showcase event - powered by the Terra Luna Blockchain - that brings together crypto-natives and non-natives in a dynamic, fun and informative festival environment. \\n\\nThe year 1 ‘genesis’ LunaFest will be hosted at a palatial manor house in the stunning English countryside, with a focus on live music, world class DJ’s, cutting edge entertainment and knowledge-sharing from global blockchain industry experts. \\n\\nLunaFest will become the world’s first Cryptocurrency festival, where the preferred currency will be UST with discounts, giveaways and promotions as a reward. \\n\\nTo achieve all this we’ve gathered a rockstar team of committed Lunatics from around the community, who are ready to deliver an event that will - literally - bring Luna to the world and change how festivals and live music are delivered, forever. \\n\\nWe will build LunaFest to become a key event in the global crypto calendar, known as a playground for gathering like minds, sharing ideas, having fun and, most importantly, helping to onboard non-natives and expand the Terra ecosystem. \\n\\nThis is ‘your’ festival and we need your help to do this, so let’s make it happen together…! \\n\\nFor more information and contribute to the discussion, please use the link below:\\n\\nAgora Post: https://agora.terra.money/t/community-grant-proposal-to-create-lunafest/3171/5\",\"recipient\":\"terra1q0ravdg782rsgdjktf9hnzy5gl678ldljpdnyp\",\"title\":\"Community Grant Proposal: LunaFest Decentralised Crypto Festival\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-01-06T17:30:49.553Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"58886641582166\",\"no\":\"84460304097589\",\"no_with_veto\":\"9774491211649\",\"yes\":\"34044035630497\"},\"proposal_id\":\"160\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2021-12-23T17:30:49.553Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2021-12-30T17:43:07.463Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2021-12-23T17:43:07.463Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.CommunityPoolSpendProposal\",\"amount\":[{\"amount\":\"3000000000000\",\"denom\":\"uusd\"}],\"description\":\"Full Proposal: https://agora.terra.money/t/community-funding-proposal-accelerate-tix-protocol-development/4627\\n\\nWe are requesting 3 million UST to accelerate the development of the TIX platform. TIX will allow the community to have direct access to the trillion-dollar a year live events industry; this does not include metaverse events that TIX will also be building in functionality for. This means that the general public will begin accessing Terra through TIX, thereby bringing in new users and new money to the ecosystem.\\n\\nOur aim is to open source our smart contract code once the project completes V2 on our roadmap. This project does not exist without the inspiration and good will of other open source projects within the Terra community. As such, we want to contribute and help inspire future projects to utilize their ingenuity, skillsets, and passion to build other incredible projects on Terra, solve vital world problems, and drive even more UST demand and adoption.\\n\\nWhy Community Funding?\\nThis community funding will allow us to accelerate the development of TIX without taking a substantial amount of private funding in order to implement all of the core functionality. We can then dedicate the maximum number of resources to developing game-breaking technology that will deliver the most value to our ecosystem and its users.\\n\\nShould the community approve this funding, we will be able to allocate tokens that would have been used to raise from VCs, back to the community in the form of Luna staker airdrops and community engagement rewards.\",\"recipient\":\"terra1meazymyzx2z2uxrawlr7r5e0l69f3z035r6ptc\",\"title\":\"Community Funding Proposal: Accelerate TIX Protocol Development\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-03-16T03:21:43.900Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"68788010958295\",\"no\":\"81102835158182\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"13885112331918\"},\"proposal_id\":\"275\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-03-02T03:21:43.900Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-03-09T03:21:43.900Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-03-02T03:21:43.900Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"https://agora.terra.money/t/community-funding-proposal-for-dex-aggregator-partnership-campaign/4523/40\\n\\nOpenOcean is the first CEX and DEX aggregator partner that has deployed on Terra. With the integration, users can now trade maximum returns on Terra-based assets executed by OpenOcean Atlantic, our second version, which provides an algorithm optimized for maximum returns that cannot be found anywhere else.\\n\\nWe would like to propose a trading competition on OpenOcean in partnership with Terra and leading Terra projects.\\n\\nThis will allow our 400,000 active user base to be introduced to the Terra ecosystem and Terra-based assets - increasing awareness and bringing on more users to Terra.\\n\\nFor this, we would like to ask the Terra community for 20kUSD worth of LUNA to allocate for campaign rewards.\",\"title\":\"Community Funding Proposal for DEX Aggregator Partnership Campaign\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-03-22T08:52:48.905Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"65552779152617\",\"no\":\"1711617032093\",\"no_with_veto\":\"32626462\",\"yes\":\"81849690627876\"},\"proposal_id\":\"325\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-03-08T08:52:48.905Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-03-16T02:23:04.573Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-03-09T02:23:04.573Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.CommunityPoolSpendProposal\",\"amount\":[{\"amount\":\"20000000000\",\"denom\":\"uusd\"}],\"description\":\"*Please note, this is a follow-up proposal for the funds to be disbursed from the community pool and that the proposal for this spend has already been passed (Prop 325: https://station.terra.money/proposal/325)\\n\\nhttps://agora.terra.money/t/community-funding-proposal-for-dex-aggregator-partnership-campaign/4523/40\\n\\nOpenOcean is the first CEX and DEX aggregator partner that has deployed on Terra. With the integration, users can now trade maximum returns on Terra-based assets executed by OpenOcean Atlantic, our second version, which provides an algorithm optimized for maximum returns that cannot be found anywhere else.\\n\\nWe would like to propose a trading competition on OpenOcean in partnership with Terra and leading Terra projects.\\n\\nThis will allow our 400,000 active user base to be introduced to the Terra ecosystem and Terra-based assets - increasing awareness and bringing on more users to Terra.\\n\\nFor this, we would like to ask the Terra community for 20kUSD worth of LUNA to allocate for campaign rewards.\",\"recipient\":\"terra1c3xk35wfncnt6px5pluyjrr7jw9jt43dg98tdv\",\"title\":\"Community Funding Proposal for DEX Aggregator - OpenOcean Partnership Campaign\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-03-30T07:23:48.350Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"13435649395505\",\"no\":\"1185190622123\",\"no_with_veto\":\"12375408\",\"yes\":\"164417909269031\"},\"proposal_id\":\"491\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-03-16T07:23:48.350Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-03-23T07:24:20.739Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-03-16T07:24:20.739Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.params.v1beta1.ParameterChangeProposal\",\"changes\":[{\"key\":\"BasePool\",\"subspace\":\"market\",\"value\":\"\\\"100000000000000.000000000000000000\\\"\"},{\"key\":\"PoolRecoveryPeriod\",\"subspace\":\"market\",\"value\":\"\\\"18\\\"\"}],\"description\":\"UST has lost peg to $1 for multiple days starting from May 8th, 2022.\\n\\nThere are a large amount of UST withdrawal, but burning of UST is slow.\\n\\nProposal is to:\\n\\n*) Increase basepool from 50M to 100M SDR\\n*) Decrease PoolRecoveryBlock from 36 to 18\\n\\nThis will increase minting capacity from $293M to ~$1200M\\n\\nDetails here:\\n\\nhttps://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-increase-basepool-to-100m-sdr-and-decrease-poolrecoveryperiod-to-18-blocks-estimated-minting-capacity-of-1200m/6287\",\"title\":\"Help UST Pegging - Adjustments to Mint/Burn Parameters\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-25T07:45:19.205Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"103906381689880\",\"no\":\"3304238321587\",\"no_with_veto\":\"34123687435\",\"yes\":\"218511410501837\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1164\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-11T07:45:19.205Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-18T07:45:19.205Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-11T07:45:19.205Z\"}"

I want the TFL LFG OZON team to make payments to everyone who held the LUNA token.\\nThey have BTC Avax in their reserves. \\n        The team must take a snapshot for May 6th when the token price was $80. "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"The decreasing price of LUNA can lead for even more problems than the depeg of UST… VALIDATORS can stop supporting the network because of huge loses!!! It will eventually ruin everything. \\n\\tThe only thing that in my opinion will save the situation is proposing a hardfork that will change all USTs to LUNA-s on all wallets and make a reverse split for all LUNA-s… We need to accept that situation was a “Death Spiral” and UST was a mistake… If the community will continue to mint new LUNA and Burn UST the project will die!\\n\\nPLEASE SUPPORT this proposal, cause that’s the only way to recover from situation… LUNA still has a great fast, decentralised blockchain with proof of stake that is needed. People won’t buy UST again. Coordinating strengths on UST and dumping LUNA is just a waste of time and money!\",\"title\":\"SAVE LUNA! DON’T FOCUS ON UST! \"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-26T14:15:23.938Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"13556925308081\",\"no\":\"5166797200296\",\"no_with_veto\":\"1008023432\",\"yes\":\"66701575516\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1196\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-12T14:15:23.938Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-19T14:15:23.938Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-12T14:15:23.938Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Optimism and perseverance!\\n\\nNo word is better than Action, For our Creator is movement and rest. Do not believe the worst, for it has already passed for those who did not notice. I believe in this gem and this will only contribute to improving what needs to be revised. Nothing is lost. Heroes appear exactly when needed, just like angels....\\nEverything here will be even stronger and for cowards and traitors simply, contempt is yours....\\nLife is made of steps, no one was born talking or walking. This is all part of growing up, and what I see here is a child who is growing strong and consistently. The protocol is excellent, there is nothing to fear.... Just another victory, and this one, with a capital V. So, let's fight with aggression where it's necessary, agility where it's slow and prudence where it's unbalanced and panicked. This too shall pass!\\nBig hug from Brazil because you will see that a son of yours does not run away from the fight!\\nEverything is happening according to the will of God.\\nBelieve me, this too shall pass.\\nLP\\nBrazil and Korea united forever!\\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z7pFwsX6UVc\\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QVQXyZ16K9E\",\"title\":\"Brazil and Korea united forever!\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-27T00:57:16.170Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"10881111979246\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"121000000\",\"yes\":\"3303060000\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1213\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-13T00:57:16.170Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-20T00:57:16.170Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-13T00:57:16.170Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Since we are now approaching insane levels of LUNA minted, why not make it a meme coin? I understand that this is a tough time for all of us but the best way I find to turn a negative into a positive is to make a joke out of it. We are the butt of the joke. Maybe name it Burning Do and we have a dollar bill on fire as our logo. If this is too soon for some I apologize. Just trying to have a bit a fun. \",\"title\":\"Make Luna a Meme Coin\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-27T01:17:12.326Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"10880123244650\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"1382480953\",\"yes\":\"1351386505\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1216\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-13T01:17:12.326Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-20T01:17:12.326Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-13T01:17:12.326Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"As soon as only UST or land-stabilized coins is the only external possibility of use, everything here will gain enormous value.\\nPerhaps, this is the turning point we needed to make the idea a reality. I also understand that all this was necessary for the project to grow initially. Now, let's stand on our own two feet and embrace the fiat world aggressively. Let's go to fight! There's a lot of application to be built around here.... Any asset other than stable coins can only be bought or traded here....\\nHug\\nLP\",\"title\":\"Perception!\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-27T01:24:08.548Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"14527786916062\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"18219295207089\",\"yes\":\"100461009700\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1217\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-13T01:24:08.548Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-20T01:24:08.548Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-13T01:24:08.548Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"As you can see the LUNA price is dropping insanely. "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Luna still trading on binance at 800 million market cap. There is no need to create a new chain. The chain worked as intended during a bank run, and people would've kept on buying it and absorbing the bank run. The one difference between luna and other algorithmic coins that had bank runs and died, is luna never would've died, people would've kept buying it and absorbing the debt over time, no matter how low, because of the adoption in crypto.\\\\nIf theres security issue over cost of attack being too low because luna price inflating exponentially, 1 of 2 things can happen:\\\\n1 luna community members can make it their responsibility to continue buying as price goes down, or\\\\n2 put in a base limit to inflation from ust to luna. Once limit is hit, ust holders dont get dollar worth of luna beyond the limit.\\\\n\\\\nBut most importantly, is this proposal is in complete disagreement with Do kwon's prioritization of preserving the community, as opposed to the integrity of the chain's mechanism. The chain worked as intended during a bank run, and should be allowed to continue, no matter the circumstances, even if it has the slightest chance of eventually recovering. This is the decentralized solution.\",\"title\":\"Do not create new chain, keep current chain, integrity of the mechanism\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-28T00:26:10.954Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5619459861848\",\"no\":\"21546170136\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"19646740890\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1241\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-14T00:26:10.954Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-21T00:26:10.954Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-14T00:26:10.954Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Shall we try one more time, with UST?\\nMint and Burn process.\\nDon't give up on UST, the path is correct, just one correction and everything will be restored.\\n\\nshall we recap, calmly?\\nThe bottom of the river is better visible when the water calms down....\\nWhat happens when creating a UST or LUNA?\\n\\n1) Why did it lose value? disregard overselling...\\n2) How is the real value of the UST physically composed and guaranteed? 1 UST:USD 1 in Bank?\\n3) What about Gold?\\n\\nMy suggestion is to keep LUNA and create GLUNA...\\nWhen a new UST is created, a part of the GLUNA and LUNA must be used for BALLAST.\\nLUNA would continue operating from the \\\"brokers\\\" ecosystem, but GLUNA would not, it would only be internal UST Support,\\nSo we would have 2 tokens supporting the UST not just one\\nThis last one in pure gold, hence GLUNA.\\nIn the process of mint a UST, a part of LUNA and a part of GLUNA would be used.\\nSo the next UST would be created from this 2 tokens\\nUST backed by GLUNA 50-70% (depending on swing) LUNA 20-50%\\nAs more UST or LUNA is purchased, a portion of GLUNA would go into the recipe to strengthen our blessed DOllar.\\n\\nSo you can keep what already exists and strengthen the new UST generated through business normally.... Life that goes on...\\nHugs and I thank God for another victory!\\nWho said no? Who?\\nOf course we will overcome this, until Monday 05/16/2022\\nLP\",\"title\":\"What a beauty!\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-28T01:03:24.688Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5619673404608\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1243\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-14T01:03:24.688Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-21T01:03:24.688Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-14T01:03:24.688Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"No despair, let's go?\\n\\nThe biggest problem is when you create a UST based only on LUNA, you are subject to all kinds of market mess.\\nThe GLUNA would be an internal currency, fully backed by gold.\\nThus, at the time of minting 1 UST, it would use part LUNA and part GLUNA. GLUNA cannot be traded outside the ecosystem and must have its price and quantity based on GOLD.\\nAt the time of minting, UST must have its largest share in the value of the gold price. Gold always beats the dollar, probably, our dollar UST, in this way, it will always be above or equal to 1 dollar if new UST is generated.\\nAs the days go by, the UST will regain its value and everything will get even better.\\nThe moment of creation that needs to be adjusted.... When creating a new UST based on GLUNA and LUNA.\\nIt will only reinforce the concept....and ensure that everything that already exists is not lost....\\nhugs and let's go together\\nLP\",\"title\":\"Mint and Burn UST (redesign)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-28T01:21:27.499Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5619623404608\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"290000000\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1244\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-14T01:21:27.499Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-21T01:21:27.499Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-14T01:21:27.499Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Basically\\nWhen you arrive at a party you need to have a present on hand...\\nYou don't create a UST based on the wind, even if LUNA has an acceptable value... "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Market economics make it impossible for investors to recover their money with all aforementioned recovery strategies, this proposal aims at recovering 100% of capital for everyone that had balances in any type of form in the terra ecosystem before de-peg.\\n\\n1. We will do a hard fork before the attack as proposed by Do but with old addresses called “founder addreses” and new regular addreses, from this point forward, only new regular non founder addresses on the ecosystem will be created.\\n2. Have the system implement a 0.5% fee on all transactions on the terra network for a reconstitution fund.\\n3. Redirect the money of the fund as it flows into the system to the affected addresses only (aka founder addreses) in a pro rata calculation, only when the address continues to be active (i.e. The address has not been abandoned promoting old users to come back to the environment) and up to the point the user is made whole at current market price, this promotes old users to come back and trade and the liability goes down as the price of Luna2 goes up, recovery and repayment of all funds will take a couple of months but given\\n4. Distribute a percentage bonus (after everyone is repaid) for those that remained with their balance at UST and those that bought Luna during its collapse.\\n5. Explore options to offer a high sustainable return for Anchor to promote user growth. \\n\\nProvisions:\\n\\n1. Patch vulnerabilities that may allow a similar attack on the network.\\n2. Widely promote the comeback of the ecosystem both by users and media.\\n\\nThe system should be made whole again\",\"title\":\"100% recovery pre -depeg proposal.\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-28T08:42:35.576Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5619283336569\",\"no\":\"603849822\",\"no_with_veto\":\"33383768426\",\"yes\":\"5380581739\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1263\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-14T08:42:35.576Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-21T08:42:35.576Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-14T08:42:35.576Z\"}"

I say unfairly because I had 100X more stake than the company surplus. For me it was 17 stab wounds in the back. Never do that again. If the investor has borrowed money and exceeds by variation, the stake value must be taken into account so that such investor is not liquidated even having much higher stakes than borrowed...\\nCase to review and improve the ecosystem.\\nWe are entering the golden age and in that age everyone wins....\\nI can't be called a freeloader either because when I started here LUNA cost 42 UST. "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"The supply of LUNA has been diluted by ~20000X. Delegations have been disabled and staking returns are something like 70166.06%. While OG stakers from before the depeg have taken a loss in the value of their stake, staking returns have not yet be diluted to the same degree. Delegations could be reenabled in a way that protects OG stakers from dilution if OG stakers were credited with a ~20000X boost to the weight of their stake. This could be implemented in a generic way according to the following formula. This effectively locks in staking returns in the case of an inflation event.\\n\\n(Weighted Stake) = (Number of LUNA staked on date) / (Total LUNA supply on date)\",\"title\":\"Weighted 20000X Delegations\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T06:21:00.215Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5624114589178\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"14445870285\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1295\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T06:21:00.215Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"500000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T06:21:00.215Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T06:21:00.215Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"I would like to bring to your attention a possible solution to save the TERRA-LUNA.\\nIt is necessary to proceed with a hard fork by changing the peg, no longer to the value of the dollar, but to a quarter of a dollar.\\nIt has very often happened to central banks to devalue their flat currency, often also as a result of financial attacks, such as on Black Wednesday of September 16, 1992, it is time to do so also for UST.\\nBut we must learn from what happened, we must introduce mechanisms in the algorithms to discourage the accumulation of too many coins in individual wallets, putting a sort of taxation for the \\\"whales\\\", it is necessary to introduce monetary policy mechanisms.\\nPlankton from around the world unite! Let's not get eaten by whales.\",\"title\":\"save the TERRA-LUNA\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T10:11:31.484Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5612766129770\",\"no\":\"12295324939\",\"no_with_veto\":\"109899010\",\"yes\":\"872473658\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1305\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T10:11:31.484Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T10:11:31.484Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T10:11:31.484Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"[edit to Proposal #1302]\\nPropose an increase to tx fees to (refer to draft formula below), and burn (80%) of fees 1:1 in LUNA:UST to assist with restoring UST peg and reduce circulating LUNA and UST supply. Community input welcome.\\n\\nAnnex.\\nProposed draft fee formula below with objective to increase fees marginally for small txs and assist with burning LUNA & UST while safeguarding against large market moving txs. Devs can likely improve on the formula.\\n\\n(Terra std tx fee) + ($1 - UST price) + ((tx value * tx value) / market cap) * 10\\n\",\"title\":\"Increase tx fees to burn LUNA & UST + protect the peg [ref proposal #1302]\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T10:33:32.952Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5612646479770\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"27034743574\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1307\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T10:33:32.952Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T10:33:32.952Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T10:33:32.952Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"1) Exchange with burning of old UST to new UST at the rate of \\n1:1 for the old UST before the collapse, i.e., before May 9,\\nfor the rest at the market rate.\\n\\n2) Exchange with burning LUNA to newUST at the market rate.\\n\\nThis way newUST will automatically provide itself with liquidity.\",\"title\":\"Creating a new UST without a hardfork.\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T11:08:03.043Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5612807329770\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"13038870088\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1308\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T11:08:03.043Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"51953935\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T11:09:00.002Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T11:09:00.002Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Terra mechanism worked as intended. So long as people were buying luna, ust would've slowly been burned. Only problem is the infinite inflation diluted existing luna holders, making the most relevant supporters of the project get diluted to practically 0. This can be prevented by, instead of having a spread when volume from ust-luna market swaps is high, keep the rate at 1 dollar of luna per 1 ust for market swaps from ust to luna, but airdrop the spread amount in luna to existing luna holders.\",\"title\":\"Solution to inflation, dilution for black swan\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T11:37:58.890Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5612779109770\",\"no\":\"157168137\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"863975008473\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1309\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T11:37:58.890Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"51000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T11:37:58.890Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T11:37:58.890Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Additions to Do Kwon's plan:\\n\\nThe LFG use $BTC and $AVAX reserves for the following:\\n\\n20 % - distributed to $LUNA stakers at the time of de-peg. The heart and sole of the community that were trapped when the ship went down, suffered the most.\\n\\n20% - Used to buy the new token ($LUNA 2.0) over a 1 year period, driving price action. These buys must be staked indefinitely and evenly to 20 different validators and proof of this must be shown. \\n\\n20% - Used to buy Gold to back $UST. Gold is the most stable asset on earth, there is nothing better for backing. \\n\\n20% - used to fund staking rewards for the revived network, creating high rewards for those that stay. \\n\\n10% - To $UST, bLUNA and $LUNA holders at the time of de-peg (Separate to stakers). This will be evenly split among those holders. Condition: You had to be holding $100worth or more in these tokens. Anyone holding a few dollars has not lost out on enough to deserve a cut. \\n\\n10% - For the LFG to keep operating and for future development. This can be used to facilitate storage for the gold supply, pay developers etc.  \\n\\nThank you \",\"title\":\"Do kwons plan 2.0 (additions)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T11:58:18.929Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5612829109770\",\"no\":\"5001000\",\"no_with_veto\":\"6901947430\",\"yes\":\"41334939255\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1311\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T11:58:18.929Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T11:58:18.929Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T11:58:18.929Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"https://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-contact-binance-coinbase-and-other-exchanges-which-have-invested-in-terra-to-contribute-their-recent-trading-fee-earned-by-ust-usdx-luna-usdx-spot-and-future-trading/15417\",\"title\":\"Contact exchange investors to contribute trading fee to the revive process\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T12:09:15.670Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5612829109770\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"7252912864\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1312\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T12:09:15.670Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T12:09:15.670Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T12:09:15.670Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"I  believe most of people who hold luna in right now (big wallet) they are a speculator or person who try to take some gain in this crash, so i suggest terra can implement tax fee in every transaction with minimum tax around 15% -20% and automatically burn that tax and reduce the total supply, with this mechanisme, every time people have transaction supply will decreased and i believe the one who sell their there token is the one who want to get some profit, so it's okay to take  15 - 20% from them to help community. it's from commuity to community, if we see on some exchange volume transaction luna in 24hours is araound 5 - 10T LUNA, so if we implement tax 15% - 20% luna we can reduce total supply like 1.5T - 2T LUNA in 24hours and we need to implement this tax until the supply can reduce to the actual number. after that, let's community decide should we stop the tax or just go with that.\",\"title\":\"Implementing Tax Fees as a Burn Mechanism and Automatically Reduce Total Supply\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T12:25:21.002Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5612256379770\",\"no\":\"173100000059\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"8586929663\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1314\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T12:25:21.002Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"100000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T12:25:21.002Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T12:25:21.002Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"New Do Kwon Plan: LFG uses $BTC and $AVAX reserves for:\\n40% is used to repurchase $LUNA and permanently destroy it to promote the rise and let people regain confidence\\n40% is used to repurchase $UST and permanently destroy $UST through repurchase\\n20% goes to cash compensation for people in the staking pool\",\"title\":\"Do kwons plan  (new)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T14:38:04.994Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5612435551567\",\"no\":\"329000000\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"6242783709\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1315\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T14:38:04.994Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T14:38:04.994Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T14:38:04.994Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"https://agora.terra.money/t/limit-ust-luna-minting-via-a-peg-to-luna-market-cap/16037\",\"title\":\"Peg UST -> LUNA minting to the market cap of LUNA\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T16:55:59.211Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613446551567\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"340531246\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1319\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T16:55:59.211Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T17:00:48.141Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T17:00:48.141Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"UST needs to be thought of as a debt owed by Luna Holders.  If the debt is never going to be satisfied, then Luna is likely doomed to fail as too much money has been sucked out of the system and too many lives have been ruined from the depeg of a \\\"stable asset.\\\"   The Luna \\\"Ecosytem\\\" that everyone wants to save IS premised on UST existing and that trust must be restored.  There is no sense saving an \\\"ecosystem\\\" that is just another random coin with little use case and a failed trust.\\n\\nSo, a tax 15% on all Luna transactions should be implemented.  Of that tax, 7.5% should be burnt to help Luna supply correct and 7.5% should go to a pool that is paid equally to all UST Holders of record once daily. This way, there is now an extra incentive to hold UST and a way to add value to it.  This value increase should allow it to slowly repeg as it should.  \\n\\nOngoing, Luna will only earn stake yield when UST is pegged.  Anytime a depeg of over 3% occurs, this system can go back into place.  This should help stabilize the system.  \",\"title\":\"UST Yield / Luna Burn to Restore System\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T18:41:03.578Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613326609770\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"9999900000\",\"yes\":\"97486417944\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1320\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T18:41:03.578Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T18:41:03.578Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T18:41:03.578Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"I was watching an interview with the USDT manager and he says there is a 1:10 reserve.\\nI was thinking about the possibility that when an investor bought luna, part of that amount would be destined to produce GLUNA and another fiat dollar and a 3 part in BTC.\\nEx. 1 LUNA = 60% GLUNA + 30% USD + 10% BTC\\nRemembering that 1 GLUNA = (110% of 1 USD) always\\nI believe that with things like this we will restore confidence to 110% and of course the famous expected parity 1:1 with firm backing like Gold....\\nWelcome to the age of Aquarius!\\nLP\\nRemembering that I still have the same 0.15 cents of gold for a week and a half without change.... solid like a rock\",\"title\":\"UST 2.0 (Considerações)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T18:53:38.040Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613441509770\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"85679992\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1321\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T18:53:38.040Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T18:53:38.040Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T18:53:38.040Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"1 BTC = 1BTC = 10000 tBTC (Terra BTC)\\n\\nUST has been corroded ahead of the eventual demise of fiat. \\nNow is the perfect time to adjust the terra ecosystem and future proof it with a currency / store of value of the future. It then makes much more sense to collateralize with BTC reserves and reduce reliance on USD / UST in the ecosystem.\\nIf Terra is considering a V2, this should be the direction.\",\"title\":\"BTC pegged stablecoin for Terra\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T19:51:06.838Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613391509770\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"3470523343\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1323\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T19:51:06.838Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T19:51:06.838Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T19:51:06.838Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"At the moment you can't just buy the moon back and brciar them to re-establish the peg. Luna is heavily compromised and has a too low price, which could create security problems with direct attacks on governance, which is why Do Kwon's choice to create a fork makes sense, and it is the right way to go, but it is not enough. these steps will also have to be taken to ensure the safety that LUNA and UST lacked.\\n1. Take a snapshot of the values ​​of the various portfolios before the attack and create 2 classes of NFT:\\nHolders of NFT LUNA\\nNFT UST holders\\nwhich will be customized with the value of the individual portfolios of the owners of the LUNA at the value before the collapse.\\nThis will allow, as soon as activated, to receive an Airdrop of the new currency (eg “LUNA2” and “UST2”) which will have a market value equal to the date of the snapshot.\\nUnfortunately this will not be enough because, if we do not solve the famous \\\"death spiral\\\", nothing prevents it from happening again.\\nThis collapse has shown how currently relatively large volumes can undermine UST's PEG and even more how rapid movements destabilize its anchoring.\\n2. Study an algorithm that slows down or prevents instant withdrawals above a certain threshold (the threshold will be calculated based on how long it will take to return to the peg if a certain order or X number of orders were executed simultaneously)\\n\\nThis would prevent those who want to manipulate the value of UST2 from instantly moving capital.\\nThe threshold will only be set to protect the ecosystem and not prevent whales from entering, so it will be well calibrated.\\n3. Instead of using only LUNA to maintain the PEG, it is possible to create not pools, but independent tanks of different redistributed coins which will intervene alternately to stabilize both LUNA2 and UST2 for example as follows: 40% BTC 25% LUNA 15% USDT / USTC /… 20% from the coins of the various CEXs who want to collaborate in the creation of the first large decentralized currency.\\n4. the TERRA Chain should not die at the moment as well as LUNA and UST, but they could become an experimental blockchain platform designed to provide a massively interoperable and scalable framework for developers (ex. Kusama for Polkadot).\\nLUNA could even become the adoption currency of future EARTH world metaverses and Games.\\n5. the LFG funds will be used for the repurchase of all the disheartened holders who, once they have obtained the Airdrop, will decide to go out and immediately resell their new coins. This will prevent the risk of a new depeg.\",\"title\":\"PLAN B\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T20:17:46.717Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613451629770\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"4379441052\",\"yes\":\"33537981417\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1324\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T20:17:46.717Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T20:22:26.848Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T20:22:26.848Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Increase Transactionfee to Luna equivalent to 1 UST an burn 90% of the Transactionfee until we hit 0.1 Luna per transaction.\",\"title\":\"Increase Transactionfee of Luna equivalent to 1 UST and burn 90% of Transactionfee\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T20:34:52.446Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613401629770\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"290000000\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1325\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T20:34:52.446Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T20:34:52.446Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T20:34:52.446Z\"}"

He should be exiled out of the blockchain and all bodies associated with Terra while people cry out shame and throw rotten tomatoes at him. "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Burn 95% of newly created coins you still will have 5% of total supply and 5% that need to be created.\\nIts simple as that if this dont work then burn more or fee as other proposition to burn more luna 1ust fee and burn 90% of the transaction as the other guy proposed.\\nThis way you still are trillioner and have your reps back.\",\"title\":\"Burn 95% of newly created coins you still will have 5% of total supply and 5% that need to be created\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T21:42:22.455Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613732648435\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1328\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T21:42:22.455Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T21:42:22.455Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T21:42:22.455Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Full proposal on Github: https://github.com/0xab3d/luna-ust-fix-proposal\\n\\nIntroducing a new token, xLUNA. xLUNA will be the coin of the community. i.e. used to vote, propose, stake etc. xLUNA to absorb the diluted pools of both LUNA and UST. xLUNA will worth a little now, but on the long run you holders will be considered as shareholders. \",\"title\":\"[Proposal] - New Governance coin to absorb UST and LUNA volatility\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T21:44:03.225Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613732648435\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"4379441052\",\"yes\":\"22299375716\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1329\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T21:44:03.225Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T21:44:03.225Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T21:44:03.225Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Terra coin is notStableCoin (stablecoin must depeg), 1      Terra = 1 Luna. To Create Terra coin must burn Luna coin. Luna -> Terra ↔ stableCoin (ust, ...). Terra coin use to create and destroy stablecoin and  peg of stablecoin.  \\nInspired from https://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-luna-and-ecosystem/10774\",\"title\":\"Create Terra coin\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T21:45:19.375Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613632648435\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"4379441052\",\"yes\":\"21712373316\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1330\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T21:45:19.375Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T21:45:19.375Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T21:45:19.375Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"\\nThe UST fall is inevitable, and this fall has led to extremely high inflation in luna. \\nI propose to reduce the ust price, peg ust=0.1USD. Doing so could effectively burns more luna and re-stabilizes ust, and reduces luna inflation, thereby increasing the price of luna. For people who lost money due to luna and ust, the community should sell BTC for UST to compensate. And in the future, peg needs to adjust the new algorithm and increase a certain USD reserve to ensure that UST is stable at 0.1\",\"title\":\"Peg UST to 0.1USD to slove luna inflation\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T22:24:31.714Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613732648435\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"100000000\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1331\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T22:24:31.714Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T22:24:31.714Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T22:24:31.714Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Inspired by https://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-new-governance-coin-to-absorb-ust-and-luna-volatility/16736\\n\\n\\nNew governance coin, xLUNA, to dilute the hyperinflation on UST and LUNA.\\n\\n\",\"title\":\"New governance coin, xLUNA, to dilute the hyperinflation on UST and LUNA\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T22:37:20.137Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613730548435\",\"no\":\"11272100000\",\"no_with_veto\":\"4379441052\",\"yes\":\"21304553539\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1332\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T22:37:20.137Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T22:37:20.137Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T22:37:20.137Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"아주 간단한 방법) \\n시장의 모든 UST를 TERRA STATION 내로 모두 회수 하세요 TERRA 네트워크안에서만 사용하면 됩니다. \\n루나는 시장에 있어 유동성을 책임집니다. \\n두번 다시 공격당할 일도 없으며 \\n우리는 1UST를 1Terra (달러와 가격 패깅)코인으로 사용하면 됩니다. \\n\\n루나는 unpeg  전으로 롤백  => LUNA \\npegLUNA 는 붕괴된 직후 발행된 루나는 pLUNA (결재코인사용)  \\n=> 테라스왑 시장에서 서서히 LUNA로 흡수 \\n\\n우리의 네트워크는 건재하며 생태계가 \\n루나의 진정한 가치입니다 .\\n시장의 잠시 교란은 훌룡한 치료제가 될것입니다. \\n\\nLUNA TERRA  화이팅 \\n\\nvery simple way)\\nRetrieve all UST in the market into TERRA STATION It can only be used within the TERRA network.\\nLuna is responsible for liquidity in the market.\\nThere is no need to be attacked twice.\\nWe can use 1UST as 1 Terra (Dollar pagging) coin.\\n\\nLuna rollback to before unpeg => LUNA\\npegLUNA is issued immediately after the collapse of pLUNA (using payment coin)\\n=> Slowly absorbed into LUNA in the terra swap market\\n\\nOur network is healthy and the ecosystem is\\nThis is the true value of Luna.\\nA brief market disturbance would be a great remedy.\\n\\nLUNA TERRA fighting\\n\",\"title\":\"very simple way 아주 간단하게 루나 살리는 방법 \"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T22:58:30.605Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613707648435\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"21359493574\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1333\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-15T22:58:30.605Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"500000000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-22T22:58:30.605Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-15T22:58:30.605Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"The xLUNA proposal is good.\\n\\nIt seems to me there are two key ways of determining the distribution of xLUNA which are described by the equations below.\\nInitial Supply: (xLUNA) = (Number of LUNA staked on date before depegging) / (Total LUNA supply on date)\\nConversion: (xLUNA) = (Number of LUNA to be converted on date) / (Total LUNA supply on date)\\n\\nOne may imagine that bLUNA holders in anchor protocol who were liquidated may not feel appropriately compensated by this proposal. Perhaps bLUNA holder before the depegging event may be compensated with ANC tokens?\",\"title\":\"xLUNA Initial Supply and Conversion Rate\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-30T01:00:30.606Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5613727648435\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1335\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-16T01:00:30.606Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-23T01:00:30.606Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-16T01:00:30.606Z\"}"
