"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Luna's growth engine is\\n1. Do Kwon & Developers\\n2. Investors, Lunatic\\n3. Speculator\\n\\nWe need to restore and rebuild trust in these people.\\n\\nLet's talk about speculators for a moment, Speculators should not be ignored. The Luna community is mostly ideal people. but the reality is not. Without speculation, Luna would not have been able to grow like this. We need to use a speculator to rebuild it again.\\nForks are not good for speculators. we must not lose them.\\nNow there are too many Lunas being issued, which is a good opportunity for speculators.\\n\\nWhat we need to do is provide a lot of airdrops(lockup) to those who trust and invest in Terra and burn a lot of Luna at the same time.\\n\\nSo simply I suggest\\n1. $0.1 UST pegging system\\n2. Airdrops for investors before being attacked\\n\\ncheer up..!\",\"title\":\"$0.1 pegging system & Airdrop(Lockup)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-30T06:23:46.444Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5623228729693\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"13383355162\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1361\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-16T06:23:46.444Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-23T06:23:46.444Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-16T06:23:46.444Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Downgrading from $1 pegging system to $0.1 pegging system\\nLet's create 100000 UST = 1BTC collateral system at the same time\\n\\nIf the BTC price falls, there will be a lot of demand for UST to prevent collateral liquidation.\\nIf the BTC price rises, more UST will be supplied and the value of Luna will rise.\",\"title\":\"We can turn crisis into opportunity.\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-30T06:58:19.405Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5623228729693\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"15000000\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1362\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-16T06:58:19.405Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-23T06:58:19.405Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-16T06:58:19.405Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"LUNA拯救方案牵扯到各方利益，迟迟不能落地，无外乎与拯救方案对新、旧势力的利益分配问题，现在提出一套对各方都有利且能够较为公平的划分利益方案。\\n1、启动新公链LUNA2 ICO。\\n2、ICO总量为10亿枚（可调整），ICO时间定于本提案生效后的第30天。\\n3、ICO可接受Token为usdt、usdc、busd、dai、ust、luna\\n4、Luna2总量分为空投、公募、社区发展三部分，空投部分补偿给ust第二次脱锚时的LUNA持有者（包含CEXers），公募部分可接受usdt、usdc、busd、dai、ust、luna等Token，以上token按照美元价值计算公募额。usdt、usdc、busd、dai、ust按照1美元计算美元价值，luna按照ICO结束时币价*110%计算美元价值。\\n5、社区发展部份锁定LUNA2总量的10%。\\n6、空投和公募的部分占据LUNA2总量的90%，比例按照ust第二次脱锚时的LUNA市值与ICO结束时LUNA市值比例分配。\\n7、ICO公募结束后ust不再享有LUNA市值的保障，原Terra链继续运行，LUNA币更名为LunaMeMe。\\n8、Terra链上的BTC等保障资金将仅支持LUNA2，不用做LUNAMeMe的市值保障。\\n9、LUNA2保有原名称LUNA\\n提案解释：\\n本提案把原来对立的新、旧LUNA和ust的持有者的利益统一起来，统一后的社区共识将空前强大，本提案有可能将本次危机化为新LUNA发展的大机遇。\\nps:本提案通过后，生效时间由社区开发者及项目方协商确定，建议在10天以内。\",\"title\":\"Recent Plan Of Luna (LUNA2 ICO)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-30T07:51:57.690Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5622728729693\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"4696609189\",\"yes\":\"1099999999\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1366\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-16T07:51:57.690Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-23T07:51:57.690Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-16T07:51:57.690Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"LUNA拯救方案牵扯到各方利益，迟迟不能落地，无外乎与拯救方案对新、旧势力的利益分配问题，现在提出一套对各方都有利且能够较为公平的划分利益方案。\\n1、启动新公链LUNA2 ICO。\\n2、ICO总量为10亿枚（可调整），ICO时间定于本提案生效后的第30天。\\n3、ICO可接受Token为usdt、usdc、busd、dai、ust、luna\\n4、Luna2总量分为空投、公募、社区发展三部分，空投部分补偿给ust第二次脱锚时的LUNA持有者（包含CEXers），公募部分可接受usdt、usdc、busd、dai、ust、luna等Token，以上token按照美元价值计算公募额。usdt、usdc、busd、dai、ust按照1美元计算美元价值，luna按照ICO结束时币价*110%计算美元价值。\\n5、社区发展部份锁定LUNA2总量的10%。\\n6、空投和公募的部分占据LUNA2总量的90%，比例按照ust第二次脱锚时的LUNA市值与ICO结束时LUNA市值比例分配。\\n7、ICO公募结束后ust不再享有LUNA市值的保障，原Terra链继续运行，LUNA币更名为LunaMeMe。\\n8、Terra链上的BTC等保障资金将仅支持LUNA2，不用做LUNAMeMe的市值保障。\\n9、LUNA2保有原名称LUNA\\n提案解释：\\n本提案把原来对立的新、旧LUNA和ust的持有者的利益统一起来，统一后的社区共识将空前强大，本提案有可能将本次危机化为新LUNA发展的大机遇。\\nps:本提案通过后，生效时间由社区开发者及项目方协商确定，建议在10天以内。\",\"title\":\"Recent Plan of Luna(LUNA2 ICO)chinese/中文\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-30T08:18:38.683Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5622728729693\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"4379441052\",\"yes\":\"1116125299\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1368\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-16T08:18:38.683Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-23T08:18:38.683Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-16T08:18:38.683Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"The Terra protocol, the Luna governance token and the ecosystem are still of great value. It's necessary to give back trust to the investors. I propose a One year transitory 1% \\\"Burn-Crash\\\" tax on the Luna transactions. This tax will be collected by the validators and will be used to burn Luna, buying it on the market. In 3 to 6 months, the Luna circulating supply will be drastically reduced. After this period, the tax will be used 50% to set up a fund to reimburse users who suffered the consequences of the crash and 50% to burn UST. At the same time, an IT engineers working group will be organized to redesign the UST and the peg mechanism will be studied in order to make it robust. When the UST will be close to parity with the dollar, the redesigned peg mechanism will be restarted. At this point, we will decide collectively to stop or to maintain this tax (maybe reduced to 0.5% or 0.25% on UST & Luna transactions) to finance the fund.\",\"title\":\"One year transitory 1% \\\"Burn-Crash\\\" tax on the Luna transactions\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-30T15:52:11.328Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5559333319214\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"278421304\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1391\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-16T15:52:11.328Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-23T15:52:11.328Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-16T15:52:11.328Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Since the incident, it has begun to stabilize, and the market has ended his death spiral. Our community, our community builders and those who support the faith in LUNA, have all contributed significantly to this process. It doesn't matter whether the contribution pushes the event in a good direction or a bad direction. However, none of us have lost our faith, it has only been lost temporarily. From the strong rebound of LUNA in the past few days and the huge volume, we can clearly see it. The market's strong confidence in TERRA, and he also contains great value, this consensus should be valued, not abandoned.\\nIn this incident, old users and community builders have suffered huge losses, and they should also be compensated. But the only way they can be compensated is to get back to TERRA-LUNA, back to the top. Only then will there be an opportunity to give back the trust of these users.\\nThere is only one trust, and so is the consensus. The consensus formed so far will drive LUNA to move forward strongly until the moon. This is already TERRA's last and most valuable asset. We should make better use of him instead of throwing him in the trash.\\nNo V2! It will not be recognized by the market. There is no value in doing that. Consensus is gone, and everyone loses.\\nI propose here to temporarily increase the transaction fee, part of it will be destroyed, and part of it will be compensated for users who have lost before.\",\"title\":\"Confidence is in TERRA- LUNA, and the rise is in an instant\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T07:52:44.440Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5559241150653\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"25529571415\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1456\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-17T07:52:44.440Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-24T07:52:44.440Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-17T07:52:44.440Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"The title pretty much says it all, $LUNA needs to be burned aggressively. \\n\\nPrinting so much $LUNA to save a stable coin without a governance proposal was just arrogance at best and showed very little care or respect for the community. \\n\\nWe need to be cautious of this fork narrative that is being pushed as it is merely to divide the community and divert attention what is really to blame for the crash. \\n\\nBy forking we are basically saying:\\n- it is ok have decisions made that do not have the communities best interest \\n- it is ok to halt then resume or reset a chain with no regard to the repercussions \\n\\nThe future from now on must be in the community's hands and not the entity that has broken it.\",\"title\":\"Burn $LUNA and scrap the fork proposals\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T09:50:42.314Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5559722150653\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"21554782900\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1474\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-17T09:50:42.314Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"150000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-24T09:50:42.314Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-17T09:50:42.314Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"My suggestion is  that  holders of LUNA voluntarily  send their LUNA to be burned to an address set and verified  by  out community ,and we may develop   some kind of reward rules for those holders who send their LUNA to burn voluntarily.  nothing is impossible as long as we stand together heartly and sincerely. in recent days, LUNA has become the most well-known and key  word all over the world medias  ,why couldn't we   make use of this  invisible value to create  or invent  some new value?\",\"title\":\"Best Solution: holders of LUNA burn theirs voluntarily\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T10:08:23.702Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5559813150653\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"629153027\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1477\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-17T10:08:23.702Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"500000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-24T10:08:23.702Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-17T10:08:23.702Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"The only way to get luna back to 100 usd is to burn smart \\n\\nwe have to use the 3 ways:\\n- get 1% to 10 % taxes on luna transfert and burn it \\n- use half of the reserve of the LFG to buy and burn\\n- borrow or get investors and convince them to buy and burn half (Binance team could join)\\nhow is that will work?\\nAfter separating Ust of Luna we have to set a goal limit of supply to 300 million luna, the volume by hour in binance is between 300billion and 1.4 trillion luna, if we burn 10% of it, the 6.9 trillion luna will decrease each hour by 30 billion upto 140 billion or more, we can decrease the tax rate after until we reach the goal and then stop it.\\nBurning the half of the reserve and getting investors and borrowers to do so will enhance the trust.\\nTaking those steps has to bring the price up to 100usd, all we need is a 300 million limit supply and and trust. \\n\\nIf you like to donate: terra18l3xx9sq35x78n4zz3str28n8sf366w4ny4l4m\\n\",\"title\":\"Burn smart - supply limit - separate from ust -restore trust\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T10:30:21.003Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5560124877722\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"1855623\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1482\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-17T10:30:21.003Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"103000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-24T20:18:20.209Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-17T20:18:20.209Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"ALL HOLDERS reciev 10% of their current LUNA or UST wallet holdings in LUNA 2.0 and UST 2.0 relative to the tokens they currently Hold in their wallet .\\nSNAPSHOT to be taken pre launch of Terra2.0 \\nWith the remaining ballance of current LUNA or UST vested to them over a 5 year period in LUNA2.0 or UST 2.0 relative to their current wallet holdings in LUNA or ust. This will restore all holders current wallet holdings in 5 years on the new fork. This seems to be fair on all people holding luna and ust and stakers who have been affected. Burn 60% of circulating supply of LUNAclassic and reopen staking to support LUNA classics continuation.\",\"title\":\"Proposal For the new FORK to Work to Benifit ALL HOLDERS\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T11:13:48.326Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5558878890492\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"201989900\",\"yes\":\"2006574131\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1483\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-17T11:13:48.326Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-24T11:13:48.326Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-17T11:13:48.326Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Hi community, \\n\\nI propose that instead of the LFG trying to compensate one group of our community they should help us all. \\nWhy and how is this possible. \\n\\nFirstly why? \\nWhat happened impacted everyone. The same event that caused UST to lose peg also caused $LUNA value to crash. So it makes zero sense to only compensate one group. \\nSecondly this creates division. $LUNA stakers are committed community members. If only UST holders are compensated this creates a THEM and US situation. Not good for a rebuild. Not good for our community.\\n\\nHow? How is everyone looked after in this situation?\\n\\nFirstly the airdrop of new tokens must be EQUAL. \\n\\n20% - $LUNA stakers (At the time of de peg) *EXCLUDING LFG staked $LUNA.  \\n20% - $UST holders (On the Terra network, just prior to depeg)\\n20% - bLUNA holders (Just prior to depeg) \\n20% $LUNA holders (At the time of depeg, On the terra network)\\n15% - Community fund/developer fund \\n5% - $UST/$LUNA holders on the Terra network at this time \\n\\nNow everyone has an equal share they need a reason to stay. This is where high staking rewards come in. \\nAre many people willing to stake and therefore secure the new network after what happened? Probably not. \\nBUT if the staking rewards are high (Over 100% APR) then it gives people a reason to stake, an opportunity to rebuild their losses over time. \\nOn top of this, high staking rewards attracts new users therefore new buyers, driving price of the new token. \\nIt benefits Everyone. Not just one group. \\n\\nBuilding a stronger community and increasing the chance of Everyone getting back what they lost. \\n\\nThank you \\n\\n\",\"title\":\"LFG to fund High staking rewards for Terra 2.0 \"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T11:17:02.995Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5559664967985\",\"no\":\"999900\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"600969998\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1484\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-17T11:17:02.995Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-24T11:17:02.995Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-17T11:17:02.995Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"​Community, trust need to be re-build!\\n\\nIt CANNOT be done with Do Kwon as CEO. Trust is fragile and it's DEAD! \\n\\nWe need an Elon Musk, with his reputation and his vista. And of course 10 BUSD and the willing to burn 5... \\n\\nTesla stock's value is mostly Elon vision and the trust he carries with him... \\n\\nWe ALL now the right strategy: first, the project buys and BURNS a lot of the tokens and ONLY THEN, they can ask us to burn our tokens... We didn't f...ed up, they did!\\n\\nNo fork or other bad strategy... only a few will benefit from that kind of BS, and only for a short period. The new token will NEVER raise as trust on leadership is dead! \\n\\nWe know we need to save LUNA, if not, crypto's adoption will loose 5 to 10 years. We are loosing the knights, the early adopters, imagine what this does to the newbies... \\n\\nWe should ALL make noise about Elon... Twitter deal is off, maybe he will be interested to be a big player in crypto and some kind of savior for a lot of good people who lost a life's savings... \\n\\nCheers, we have to save our LUNA-s! \",\"title\":\"Exit Do! We need to re-build TRUST now!\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T11:51:55.691Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5559648967985\",\"no\":\"405239759999\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"27898810\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1486\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-17T11:51:55.691Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-24T11:56:45.931Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-17T11:56:45.931Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"UST－LUNA 当UST小于1美元时，销掉于1UST的美元，即按当前兑美元价格兑换成论LUNA和一定量的债务币，如UST 0.21U时，luna等于1U时，即兑成0.21个LUNA+0.79的UST债务币如ASUT,当ust大于1时，如有新的铸币需求，即优先销掉AUST兑成LUNA，（AUST未销掉前可以\\n\\n按市场价折价交换）UST不是庞氏，只是它处理危机时考虑不周，因为LUNA是一个盈利的系统，并不是以前的算法稳定币一样，没有任何的内在价值而生成的美元，其内在相当于相信LUNA的\",\"title\":\"给官方的建议－思虑再三，解决UST－LUNA脱节锚的好似是好办法\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T17:48:13.067Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5560124877722\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"10600000\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1519\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-17T17:48:13.067Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-24T17:48:13.067Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-17T17:48:13.067Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Propose to help repeg UST to the dollar by incentivizing the purchase and use of UST and burning the extra supply.  \\n1.  Institute a peg of UST to 1 USD in Terraswap, allowing the swapping of UST for any coin in Terraswap at a 1USD value.  This will incentivize people to purchase UST in outside exchanges, and thus push up the price.  Terraswap users can then transfer those coins to outside exchanges to sell, and repurchase more UST.\\n2.  Increase the fee paid in Terraswap by 100x as long as the price of UST on the open market is below $0.999\\n3.  Require fees to be paid in LUNA, as long as the price of UST on the open market is below $0.999\\n4.  Burn all fees paid on Terraswap and Astroport as long as the price of UST on the open market is below $0.999\\n5.  Burn all UST and LUNA swapped in Terraswap or Astroport, thus reducing the supply, as long as the price of UST on the open market is below $0.999\\n\\nThis will help push the UST peg back toward 1 USD while helping to compensate previous supporters for their losses in the crash.  In doing this, the supply of LUNA and UST will be reduced drastically as long as the value of UST remains below $.999\\n\\nLosses from Terraswap during this time should be compensated by the BTC and other crypto reserves of the LFG and community pools.  \",\"title\":\"Terraswap UST repeg to USD\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T19:40:47.369Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5559293340880\",\"no\":\"3278345986\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"2005468993\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1536\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-17T19:40:47.369Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-24T19:51:16.600Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-17T19:51:16.600Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"to restore the confidence and the peg, a lot of Luna should be burned (no more minting of Luna). I hope the stories about suicides are not true, otherwise the people who provoke this death spiral intentionaly to profit from, would get a very strong punition now or in the future (the law of the nature, KARMA) as millions of people are affected. with this proposal, they could do a very good action by being the whale burners. "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"I hear lots of calls from new members to have a token burn. I do not think most understand how the algorithm works, so I think we need to help spread the message on how the community is the only ones that are able to return value to LUNA Classic. If you want LUNA burnt, you need to SWAP LUNA for UST. This will automatically burn LUNA and help return UST to peg price. An added bonus: with the allocations proposed in Do Kwons fork proposal, UST holders get the best deal on air drops for the new coin. You will pay an average of $4 per air drop coin based on current UST price. With the current LUNA price you only get 1 coin for every $13 worth of LUNA you hold. In addition, you get to keep your coins on the LUNA Classic chain, and if enough people swap LUNA for UST, you are bringing UST back up to peg and increasing the value of LUNA as it burns. Only the community has the ability to save LUNA Classic, there is nothing Do Kwon or the team has the ability to do at this point in the game other than plan the fork. Do your part to make both chains successful as has happened with both ETH and BTC with their forks.\",\"title\":\"Help the Community Understand how only they can save Luna Classic\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-01T04:58:58.261Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5558937565194\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1599\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-18T04:58:58.261Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-25T04:58:58.261Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-18T04:58:58.261Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"After analyzing the blockchain, it appears that some transactions should be explained by the LFG, for the sake of transparency for the community and investors.\\n\\nFirst of all, the transfer of 25012 BTC on May 9, 2022, with a value of 842 million USD. Then a series of transfers on May 9, 2022, totaling 70752 BTC and valued at 2,380 billion USD.\\n\\nGiven the off-chain nature of these transactions and their amount, we strongly recommend the LFG to communicate their purpose and intent.\\n\\nWe would suggest LFG publish in detail the actions that have been taken to maintain the UST peg, as well as the reports of the transactions that have been made on the exchanges. Given the circumstances and the amount involved, the highest level of transparency is required for the sake of the project and its community.\\n\\nThe full review and the market analysis can be found on the Luna research forum:\\nhttps://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-to-the-luna-community-by-the-guy-who-forked-ethereum/32193\\n\\nThis article was also posted on the Callisto Network Gitbook:\\nhttps://callisto-network.gitbook.io/callisto-network/analysis-and-proposals-related-to-other-blockchain-projects/luna-hardfork-review-by-the-guy-who-forked-ethereum\",\"title\":\"Proposal to the Luna Community By The Guy Who Forked Ethereum\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-01T20:57:31.738Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5563149019231\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"4960321242\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1673\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-18T20:57:31.738Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"55000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-25T20:57:31.738Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-18T20:57:31.738Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Please stop talking about this damn fork. Recover the UST with the new UST 2.0 version, fully backed by gold, dollar and BTC.\\nAs indicated.\\n\\nGold Benefits: Best profitability in history against any currency, we have PAXG and BTG available if you don't want to keep physical gold. But make contracts with companies that have real ballast. Another benefit is liquidity, it is a commodity accepted even in the other world, according to the pharaohs' belief... Lol.\\nBenefits of BTC: Future store of value for the next 150 years, but for now it suffers a lot of manipulation by the retards.\\n\\nSo, we would look like this: UST 2.0 and keep the current structure.\\nUST 2.0 Composition:\\n1) GLUNA (60%) Dollar (30%) BTC (10% when it has more value, can be used with greater weight in the UST currency basket)\\n2) This dollar must be fully audited, having its total at 1:10. In other words, we would have 10% guarantee for each UST 2.0\\n\\nI hope I have helped and I believe that this is a good way.\\nWelcome to the age of Aquarius\\nLP\",\"title\":\"Special request (UST 2.0)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-01T21:06:57.419Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5563345070013\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1674\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-18T21:06:57.419Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-25T21:06:57.419Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-18T21:06:57.419Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"1. Buyback all circulating LUNA at fixed price (0.0016 UST) and issue 6.91 T � 0.0016 = 11.056 bn UST (if all LUNA tokens offered for buyback). Buyback to be operational for 15 days after acceptance of this proposal.\\n2. After the end of buyback period, burn all LUNA tokens.\\n3. Issue new LUNA2 tokens to holders \\nbefore the de-peg on pro-rata basis. No. of \\nnew LUNA2 tokens to be equal to circulating supply of UST after the buyback.\\n4. Peg UST to USD in 10:1 ratio and\\nLock LUNA2 tokens for an unspecified period till the time mkt cap of LUNA2 on the strength of its DeFi protocol reaches 5 times the mkt cap of UST and stays so for atleast 3 months continuously. \\n5. Thereafter restart the UST-LUNA pegging algorithm and tweak the algorithm to allow automatic suspension of its operation on \\ncertain indications & reversion to collatarized model (LUNA being the collateral) till indications revert to normal. \\n6. Sufficient LUNA should also be issued to LFG to manage collateralization in times of distress.\\nPlease also visit https://twitter.com/Ankur_Mutreja/status/1527038859753623552?t=y_5vuiHY7_drV-RuOYoqTg&s=19\",\"title\":\"Buyback and Burn LUNA\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-01T23:05:18.431Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5563295070013\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1680\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-18T23:05:18.431Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-25T23:05:18.431Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-18T23:05:18.431Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"following my #1615 proposal (censored, visible here: https://station.terra.money/proposal/1615 ). as most people are now broke with the depeg drama, but some of them want to express their opposition to the fork but can't do it (no lunas or ust left to send to the burner address) or their vote on the governance proposal is negligible with the whale size of the validators. I want to make a free luna faucet. I will put 100 000 lunas (up to 1 million) in it for the start. others people are welcome to replenish it. 1 luna should be enough for the transaction fee (now, it is 0.6 luna but maybe the fee will go up). I think there is no faucet on the  main net (there is one on testnet)\\nto avoid abuse, if technically possible, make the luna coming from this faucet just good to be sent to the burner address.\\n\",\"title\":\"URGENT: developper needed to create a luna faucet on Terra main net\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-02T01:52:57.959Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5563271370013\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1689\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-19T01:52:57.959Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"500000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-26T01:52:57.959Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-19T01:52:57.959Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"\\n1. Buyback all circulating LUNA at fixed price (0.0016 UST) and issue 6.91 T � 0.0016 = 11.056 bn UST (if all LUNA tokens offered for buyback). Buyback to be operational for 15 days after acceptance of this proposal.\\n2. After the end of buyback period, burn all LUNA tokens.\\n3. Issue new LUNA2 tokens to holders before the de-peg on pro-rata basis. No. of new LUNA2 tokens to be double that of circulating supply of UST after the buyback.\\n4. Peg UST to USD in 20:1 ratio and lock half of LUNA2 tokens for an unspecified period till the time mkt cap of LUNA2 on the strength of its DeFi protocol reaches 5 times the mkt cap of UST and stays so for atleast 3 months continuously. The locked LUNA2 token can be used by LFG to maintain the peg.\\n5. Thereafter restart the UST-LUNA2 pegging algorithm and tweak the algorithm to allow automatic suspension of its operation on certain indications & reversion to collatarized model (LUNA2 being the collateral) till indications revert to normal. Sufficient LUNA should also be issued to LFG on the start of UST-LUNA2 peg to manage collateralization in times of distress.\\nPlease also visit https://twitter.com/Ankur_Mutreja/status/1527038859753623552?t=y_5vuiHY7_drV-RuOYoqTg&s=19\\n\",\"title\":\"Buyback & Burn Luna\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-02T06:02:40.392Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5545478326168\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"17982859399\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1696\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-19T06:02:40.392Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"51000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-26T06:02:40.392Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-19T06:02:40.392Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"This proposal will remove and ban Kwon Do-hyung (권도형), hereafter referred to as \\\"Do Kwon\\\", from any governance actions and contributions related to Luna-Terra and UST. "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"New contract that would allow anyone holding Native Terra Luna tokens to convert from Terra V1 to Terra V2. �All buys and sells of Terra Luna would be subject to a 10% tax. �Of that 10%, 4% would be redistributed to any holder of native Terra Luna prior to March 9th. �Anyone that bought on March 9th or after would not be eligible for this 4% redistribution. �This would be determined by taking a snapshot of the blockchain on that day. �\\n\\n3% would go towards burning the supply which would start at 1T Luna Coins at the genesis of the contract and would continue until the supply reached a 100M. �\\n\\nThe remaining 2% would be split 50/50 going to both the Terra team and to a liquidity pool. �This would also be the case for the 2% wallet to wallet transfer fee. �\",\"title\":\"10% Transaction Fee on Buys/Sells 2% Wallet Transfer Fees\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-02T08:55:36.566Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5545478326168\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"16471901851\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1718\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-19T08:55:36.566Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"102000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-26T08:57:16.718Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-19T08:57:16.718Z\"}"

The fact that he did not disclose Basis Coin as part of his history should be enough to confirm his character.  He gambled with a $40 Billion market cap and lost it. Luckily there is governance..so let us use governance as our tool to rebuild Luna back.  The old chain..not a fake fork! "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Why?\\n1) Will there be a significant old age that would justify this?\\n2) Is there any dirt being hidden?\\n3) Are there any failures that were identified and not reported to the community?\\n4) Is there any financial interest on the part of those involved|?\\n\\nThe ecosystem's success was mainly due to the UST concept, which in my point of view was brilliant. Ironically, it was also the apparent reason for the crash.\\n\\nSuggestion: Let's focus where we really should, recover the price of the UST and its dignity, the LUNA with its market price and a backing in the UST 2.0 (considering gold, dollar and BTC in this basket) Once that is done, I guarantee that we will turn around over. Could you please answer the questions on the forum to bring peace to investors? "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"We have a new IBC demo https://TerraWeb.pro because Terra validator disabled IBC as a stop-gap solution to preventing Impermanent Loss on UST and LUNA pools on Osmosis and other IBC DEXs. "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"This proposal is to support the voice of all the community members in favor of significant Luna token burning. "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"I have watched over the last few weeks as what seems like more coins are being sold on exchanges than exist, even after the increase in supply. But this creates a very large opportunity for the community to once again thwart the shorters looking to gain from others demise.\\n\\nIf more LUNA coins are being shorted then are in supply at exchanges, if we pull our coins off to wallets (which you need to do anyway to get the airdrop), then it will cause a huge short squeeze as exchanges will force liquidations of short positions to fulfill coin withdrawals.\\n\\nSo I am asking the community to pull our coins off of exchanges now so we can finally get true price discovery and destroy the shorters instead of rolling over and letting them win and destroy LUNA.\\n\\nRegards,\\nCryptoBlockchainTechnologies\",\"title\":\"Gamestop moment\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-04T13:38:19.551Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6037231877008\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1834\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-21T13:38:19.551Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-28T13:38:19.551Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-21T13:38:19.551Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Issue New LUNA (v2), and burn Old Luna (LUNC)\\n\\nLUNA (v2) - Accept the fork proposal, with minor adjustments\\n1.\\tNo allocation of new Luna (V2) for Post-attack LUNA holders.\\n2.\\tAllocate as per the proposal to pre-attack Luna holders, and pre-attack, and post-attack UST holders. \\n\\nClassic LUNA (LUNC)\\n1.\\tBurn the excess amounts of LUNC and reduce it to roughly quadruple the amount of LUNA (v2).\\n2.\\tIntegrate LUNC into the ecosystem, by giving incentives to developers to use it for specific purposes at reduced costs, such as in-app purchases or addons to services provided. \",\"title\":\"Issue New LUNA (v2), and burn Old Luna (LUNC)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-04T19:21:57.676Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6045864303581\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1850\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-21T19:21:57.676Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-28T19:21:57.676Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-21T19:21:57.676Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"See full proposal Summary here\\n\\nhttps://agora.terra.money/t/new-ust-lunac-revival-plan-leadership-bid/14069?u=deathstar_daddy\\n\\nI am proposing a solid plan to fix, and revive LUNA Classic and UST, as well as to further build and enhance the ecosystem.\\n\\nI am further proposing a leadership change. I am inserting myself to lead LUNA Classic and UST. I am doing this as Do Kwon & TerraLabs will obviously be busy with the new LUNA coin ecosystem they are building from the fork.\\n\\nHowever with that said, I am very hopeful to retain both Do Kwon and TerraLabs in some new form of a Partnership. They will not be leading our ecosystem containg LUNA Classic, or UST, but by maintaing a small ownership stake, and or other form of investment in NEWCO. As Do Kwon and his team are far more knowledgeable on our ecosystem they anyone, they would be a strong asset to Newco.\\n\\nI myself, along with a New Team will lead Newco along with the ecosystem containing Classic and UST moving forward with the plan laid out on the link above. While market conditions may require us to deviate from it slightly, the core plan will not be changed. At least not wothout a vote. But we believe this to be the best plan moving forward.\",\"title\":\"New UST And Old LUNA Revival plan And Leadership Bid\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-05T00:07:09.460Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6231569505903\",\"no\":\"209592232100\",\"no_with_veto\":\"8415416951\",\"yes\":\"77220137308\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1866\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-22T00:07:09.460Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"51720797\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T00:54:04.831Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-22T00:54:04.831Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"contract implementation\\nreduce the highest rate of moons in circulation with a low scheduled tax aggression\\nbuy\\nsale\\np2p\\nfirst stage\\n80% burning tax on all operations\\nsecond stage\\n50% burn on all operations\\nthird stage\\n30% burn on all operations\\nfourth stage\\n  20% burn on all operations\\nFifth stage\\n10% burn on all trades\\nsixth stage\\n0% burn on all trades\\nall resurgence options will be carried out within the Wallet Terrastation with this we would achieve that the circulating terras move from the exchanges and other protocols\\nthose who send their terra before the launch of terra 2.0 will achieve better profits from exchanges with the new token\\nlet's save old terra too\",\"title\":\"Rebirth $LUNA Ecosystem (soon Luna Clasic)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-05T13:42:28.262Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6473637756308\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1911\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-22T13:42:28.262Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T13:42:28.262Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-22T13:42:28.262Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"We are proposing that the UST in the community pool be used to buy the former prison island, Alcatraz so that Luna can imprison Do Kwon there for his crimes. \\n\\nBy voting for this proposal you are signaling that you believe Do Kwon should be punished for his crimes by being imprisoned on Alcatraz, which can be bought with UST.\\n\\nBy voting against this proposal you are signaling that you are an evil person who does not care about Luna & does not want Do Kwon brought to justice for his crimes. \",\"title\":\"Buy Alcatraz Island from the US government and use it as a jail for Do Kwon \"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-05T17:42:57.903Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6473438756308\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"3213920518\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1918\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-22T17:42:57.903Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T17:42:57.903Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-22T17:42:57.903Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"I propose a special purpose staking model where holders of LUNAC can stake it to earn LUNA. \\n\\nClaiming your LUNA rewards will burn your LUNAC.\\n\\nThis or something like this has the following benefits:\\n\\n(1) Takes a lot of supply out of circulation \\n(2) Provides a clear and fair transmission mechanism for LUNAC holders to acquire LUNA\\n(3) Gives some predictable value to LUNAC while LUNA rolls out\\n(4) Reduces sell pressure of new LUNA \\n(5) Creates a predictable path to reducing LUNAC supply\\n\\nI really think this is a fair proposal that can even coexist with current proposals. So many lunatics want a path to burning, that I think a \\\"Stake Burn to Earn\\\" model should be available to those who want to use it. \\n\",\"title\":\"Burn LUNAC with Staking! (Burn to Earn)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-05T20:52:55.936Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6469351926568\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1923\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-22T20:52:55.936Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-29T20:52:55.936Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-22T20:52:55.936Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"This is the Terra UST 2.0 website https://TerraUST.me\\n\\n**The LUNA downward spiral occurred, because UST became too large too quickly. However, while the $UST market cap remains small in comparison to the market cap of LUNA, even an exit of a large majority of UST holders can be absorbed by LUNA without much issue. For example, if UST remains capped at 20% of the $LUNA market cap, an exit of 80% = 16% of the market cap would only lead to a reduction of the LUNA market cap by 50% or less.\",\"title\":\"Keep UST in the ecosystem and cap its market cap at 20% of the LUNA market cap.\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-06T04:10:11.017Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6469477708734\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1934\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-23T04:10:11.017Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"100000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-30T04:10:11.017Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-23T04:10:11.017Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"I suggest we propose to lunatics the following, and ask lunatics to be the word of mouth engine, to make it happen, trust me we can\\n\\nTHE IDEA\\n\\nSINCE THE WORLD IS GETTING LARGER EVERY DAY, WHY DO WE HAVE TO KEEP A COIN LIKE BTC LEADING, WHERE PEOPLE ARE DEALING WITH FRACTIONS OF BTC, IN OTHER WORDS, WHY DO YOU NEED TO BUY A COKE WITH 0.0000012365 BTC. LUNA IS THE SOLUTION, JUST LIKE PRINTING MONEY, WE HAVE AROUND 7 TERRLION COINS READY, AND WE HAVE A MASSIVE COMMUNITY WHO ARE ABLE TO CONVINCE THE WORLD, TO TRANSFORM TO LUNA, AND ASSUMING LUNE WILL GO BACK TO 10USD, YOU WILL PAY FOR YOUR COKE 0.1 LUNA NOT 0.000072347\\n\\nIN OTHER WORDS, THE WORLD REQUIRES AN UNDERSTANDABLE CLEAR AMOUNT WHILE TRADING DAILY\\n\\n#LUNAISCLEAR\",\"title\":\"BETTER CURRENCY NOW THAN ALL\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-06T06:38:21.998Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6633374395491\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1938\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-23T06:38:21.998Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"91000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T16:08:55.542Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-24T16:08:55.542Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Penalty for spammers and fishing actors\\n\\nWe've all seen bad actors capitalize on Terra-related events by buying $LUNA in large quantities and ever since they\\npost spam messages or fake offers on Station with phishing sites.\\n\\nI propose to put in place the following sanctions\\n\\nFor fishing messages\\nWhereas are considered filing message\\n- All messages that post spam messages or fake Station offers with links to phishing sites.\\n1 seizure of the contents of the luna wallet and burn of all lunas of the offender\\n2 also enter ust if there are any\\n3 Blocking of the offender's wallet\\n\\nFor spam messages\\nWhereas are considered as spam message\\n- All messages that do not concern any proposal and that only convey opinions or messages comparable to blog discussion\\n\\n1 Blocking of the offender's portfolio for 30 days and display of a warning window\\n\\nIf recurrence only 1 time whatever the period in time.\\n1 seizure of the contents of the luna wallet and burn of all lunas of the offender\\n2 also enter ust if there are any\\n3 Blocking of the offender's wallet\\n\\nLet's show that luna station is not a playground\",\"title\":\"Penalty for spammers and fishing actors\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-06T07:05:52.733Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6469492708734\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"572000000\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1939\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-23T07:05:52.733Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-30T07:05:52.733Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-23T07:05:52.733Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Provide in the Fork of Luna a reserve for Farming (Luna classic becoming Burn after a period of 1 year).\\nExample: place 1,000,000 Classic Luna in \\\"Farming Burn 365 days\\\", then receive every 30 days for 1/12th of a reward proportional to a percentage of LUNA planned at the launch of the Farm.\\nThis system would therefore perform a staking of Luna at the same time as a de-staking (Burn) of classic Luna.\\nExample for the pool, The staking and de-staking pool:\\nLuna Classic de-staking: 5,000,000,000,000 maximum deposit\\nStaking Reward: 10,000,000 Luna\",\"title\":\"Farming Classic Luna for Burn and Luna Reward\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-06T15:20:40.213Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6473727590100\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1952\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-23T15:20:40.213Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"1000000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-30T15:20:40.213Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-23T15:20:40.213Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Every day is about 500,000 transactions, so we can obtain (500,000 x 1 UST) = 500,000 UST this will be used for the repurchase and burning of LUNA and UST in the proportion 50% - 50%, this will increase the price of LUNA and UST.\",\"title\":\"Add 1 UST per transaction to the network fees, 50% - 50% profit to repurchase and burning of LUNA and UST.\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-06T16:42:42.493Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6473527590100\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1954\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-23T16:42:42.493Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"10000000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-30T16:42:42.493Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-23T16:42:42.493Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Right now traders/speculators make large profits from Luna on different exchanges, but the members of the community, who put their trust and savings are desperate. So please implement a burn tax with every transaction, for example 3% burn tax on each buy and sell transaction and we can burn around 300,000,000,000 LUNA in short time. This burn tax should be sent to burn wallet  until the supply is low enough. The reason of burning is obvious: there is a huge volume of LUNA and so the value can not be recovered not even near 1 $.\",\"title\":\"Set BURN fee with each LUNA transaction and send the fee to BURN WALLET\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-06T17:25:50.522Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6557262669705\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"1000994940\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1955\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-23T17:25:50.522Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-30T17:25:50.522Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-23T17:25:50.522Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Jamin k, proposing tax to be imposed on everything transaction. Transaction charges to be less than or equal to 12 percent on every ongoing transaction on the Terra UST Classic and Terra LUNA classic to drastically reduce the supply. After huge amount of burn the max supply to stop at 500millions both UST and LUNA. If possible contact exchanges to impose additional tax which will be sent directly to dead\\nwallet. The more the transaction ongoing on the blockchain the higher the burn percentage and vice versa. Burn automatically stop at agreed supply of coin's. If the proposal to make new blockchain of LUNA passes it is we the community who will be responsible for the running of UST and LUNA classic and we should implement what is needed fast when the transaction's are still high. All these depend on if the fork happens or making new blockchain.\",\"title\":\"The Burn Ultimatum\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-06T20:19:22.983Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6558877066311\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1957\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-23T20:19:22.983Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-30T20:19:22.983Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-23T20:19:22.983Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"The arbitrage algorithm works. Allow people en mass to buy UST from the market, and convert each UST into $1 worth of LUNA (how ever many that may be.) sell the LUNA for its equivalent value. \\nExample: (numbers are arbitrary to illustrate the example) \\nbuy 100UST for $5 (1ust=$.05)\\nTrade 100UST for 1000 LUNA (1luna=$.10)\\n(each UST is treated as though it is 1USD in the trade) \\nThrough this the demand for the LUNA exchange ratio goes up, and the demand for the convertibility of UST goes up. \\nThe opportunity cost for selling UST under $1 will be too high, and the risk of loss associated with selling LUNA under $1 will be too high. \\nAs designed, the supply and demand mechanism will restore balance. It will be like a new aged gold rush. "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Due to the huge supply jamin proposes\\nImmediate actions:\\n*Stop minting and disable minting of new tokens completely.\\n*Start burning tokens.\\n*If possible contact all exchanges to impose tax on all trades ongoing then send the tokens to dead wallet.\\n*Community burn where there is a website designing for burns. And if anybody wants they can can send some tokens not necessarily LUNA or UST or their classic version but also one can be able to send any crypo currency which will be directly converted to LUNA and sent to burn wallet directly.\\n*On chain LUNA burn: all transactions on terra chain to be taxed and the tokens sent to dead wallet address.\\n*Based on the total volume of transaction the percentage of tax(which will be sent to dead wallet)\\nis set , example would be set transaction charge to <=12 if on chain transaction reduces the lesser the tax and vice versa.\\n\\n\",\"title\":\"BURN ULTIMATUM\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-07T06:47:25.177Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6597597403819\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1971\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-24T06:47:25.177Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T06:47:25.177Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-24T06:47:25.177Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"On April 30, a meeting was convened between Do Kwon and Terra's rich shareholders (better known as \\\"whales\\\"). What was so strange about this meeting wasn't that it capped off a spending spree -- where the Luna Foundation Guard bought BTC with inflated UST and LUNA assets -- it was that it directly preceded the dissolution of both arms of Terraform Labs Corporation in Korea, which happened ON THE SAME DAY OF KWON'S MEETING WITH TERRA SHAREHOLDERS. I first learned about this in an article published by Coindesk, but later confirmed it in a report by the South Korean newspaper Korea JoongAng Daily -- which made the claim after reviewing Supreme Court documents regarding the dissolution.\\n\\n\\nBesides defending the American investors who held LUNA & UST, I felt it was important to honor the 280,000 Korean investors in the Terra platform who have lost in excess of $40 billion USD on a project that was so clearly flawed from the beginning. Like many other LUNAtics, I guess I got carried away with the project and decided to overlook the red flags that are so visible now. All things stated, it is important for you to abandon this project immediately before you lose any more money. Korean police have launched an investigation against a Luna Foundation Guard employee who is said to have embezzled assets once the precipitous decline of LUNA and UST began. Terra is dead, and Do Kwon should be investigated for defrauding millions of people around the world -- like you and me. You have been warned.\\n\",\"title\":\"Investigate Do Kwon For Fraudulent Activity Leading Up To The Terra's Fall\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-07T09:52:23.606Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6603948403819\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1972\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-24T09:52:23.606Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T09:52:23.606Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-24T09:52:23.606Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"We're proposing a TAX & BURN mechanism to be added to the current LUNA. 3% TAX on all transactions of which the breakdown is 2% Burnt + 1% stored in treasury to hold as collateral for UST. In addition to this we propose removing the link between UST and current LUNA + Remove minting ability on current LUNA. The above proposal will ensure original LUNA can reduce its supply efficiently and help bring back UST in a collateralized form backed 1-1 with LUNA Similar proposal to https://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-burn-and-remedy-fee-with-each-luna-transaction-part-i/12176\",\"title\":\"LUNA CLASSIC + UST REVIVAL\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-07T09:58:07.406Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6603948403819\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1973\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-24T09:58:07.406Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T09:58:07.406Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-24T09:58:07.406Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"I propose to keep the entire ecosystem as it is to avoid inconvenience to all involved. I mean brokers, protocols and partners. I have no way to measure the volume of effort to make a fork, but what I know in SAP gives you an idea ;-D.\\nBy the way, I reinforce that I am a FreeBSD user here at home... we would say that I have some knowledge... So, following the steps of the UST 2.0 process\\n\\n1) Creation of the Entity (TFF) Talked with Governments (authoritative) I want to be a partner of the Holding....\\n2) Creation and management of the TFF, GLUNA or LUNAC governance token, as you wish... this token must have a parity greater than the dollar by at least 20%, LUNAC = (a basket of assets)\\n3) Disable LUNA from the current UST coining engine.\\n4) Keep LUNA as a capitalizer and avoid inconveniences such as contracts and etc... I don't even want to get into this detail that wears out too much. Keep and avoid headaches for everyone.\\n5) Burn Do Kwon 40%'s wallet and everyone involved who had the mouse idea to sell less BTC than he bought, could have borrowed on him and mitigate the leak.\\n6) Raise the price of LUNA to at least 2 USD, it will help a lot... in the minting of the new UST2.0.\\n7) Stop playing with other people's patience and prevent me from taking a plane to Korea and solving this issue myself...\\nHug and count on me, even if distant!\\nLP\\nYou don't spend more than you have, basic rule.... Viva UST 2.0\",\"title\":\"UST2 (Terra-Fiat-Foundation) Final\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-07T21:05:45.247Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6633359527303\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"1990\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-24T21:05:45.247Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"2999630000001\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-05-31T22:43:14.794Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-24T22:43:14.794Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"In this new proposal we understand that the community is divided some want the burn some want the \\\"fork\\\", this being said, we propose that the \\\"fork\\\" can keep its way, in this proposal we just want for the community to not be forgotten, for that we propose that the burning address can be post officially in all social media from luna and to the team to support the initiative. on the other hand, we need a burning in all transactions no less than 3%, and half goes to the burning address and half goes to a foundation created officially to help repay UST holders pre depeg .like you can see this will not affect the new chain will just give more trust to the community.this should be true until max supply is 10 billion ( we need more transparency in relation to the max supply and circulation supply)  \",\"title\":\"#BurnLuna\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-08T13:44:09.188Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6671286527303\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"2003\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-25T13:44:09.188Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"113000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-01T13:45:42.493Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-25T13:45:42.493Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Terra 3.0 is the most decentralization at the largest scale in all of crypto: https://v3Terra.com\\n\\n1 - How much new LUNA you will get for each category:\\n\\n• Pre-attack LUNA - 1 : ~1.1\\n• Pre-attack aUST - 1 : 0.033\\n• Post-attack LUNA - 1 : 0.000015\\n• Post-attack UST - 1 : 0.013\\n\\nEg, if you have 1,000 UST on May 27th you will get 0.013 * 1,000 = 13 new LUNA.\",\"title\":\"Terra 3.0 + LUNA airdrop on May 27th\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-08T14:17:06.323Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6671286527303\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"2005\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-25T14:17:06.323Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"46885475967\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-01T14:36:21.645Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-25T14:36:21.645Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"I'm unofficial but here to share great ideas for terra labs to overview. if the vote proposal passes then we can make it a official vote proposal for terra labs to propose then adjust as need be. A 3.5% tax on luna classic with 2% being burned per trade, 1% going to reserves to back ust, the .5% used to help users receive higher staking rewards with luna 2.0.  Once ust repegs we will continue the minting process for luna classic and ust. Then dropping the burn rate to 1% and the increasing the reserves to 1.5% on tax trades to ensure stability, 1% used in helping luna 2.0 have greater staking rewards. eventually I would like to see a permanent small burn even as low as 0.01% for luna classic, 1.49% going in reserves with 2% of the tax going directly into supporting luna 2.0 and offer greater rewards to everyone staking and then that way we can turn the greatest of failures into the biggest successes and ensure lunas twin sister with a great future.\",\"title\":\"Luna 2.0, Luna Classic, Ust + Minting. Turning failures into Success Proposal.\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-09T00:23:46.605Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6679512527303\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"2010\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-26T00:23:46.605Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-02T00:23:46.605Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-26T00:23:46.605Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"We recommend sending all UST in LFG to Anchor in new Terra 2 network as yield reserve. Then increase the interest rate to 40-50% to pull all the UST in the market back to the Anchor. When the UST hit 0.9$ gradually reduce the interest rate to 10%. If UST get back 1$, reduce the interest rate to even 1%. Anchor play as FED roles.\\nGood things: 1/3 no UST will be compensated to people for dumping it again. 2/3 Current UST market holders will be lending in Anchor to prevent panic dumping. 3/3 Get more users onboard new Terra 2.0. This would make UST holders at whole again.\",\"title\":\"Utilize the current UST in LFG to pull UST back to the bank\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-09T02:04:35.089Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6679512527303\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"2012\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-26T02:04:35.089Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-02T02:04:35.089Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-26T02:04:35.089Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"We’re proposing to re-activate staking on Luna Classic after the airdrop snapshot on may 27th so a decentralized community who wishes to stay on Luna classic can take part on governance as it should be in a decentralized POS project.\\nSince LFG ,Do Kwon and Co will focus on the new Luna we want to focus on Luna Classic with people who wishes to participate on that project hence we also would like to get the possibility to vote for our own validators/deligators and take part on Luna Classic governance\\n\\nPlease remember when staking is re-enabled people can start staking again and delegete their vote/voice to validators who represent their opinion.\\n\\nThe blockchain would be moved back into communities hands like it was designed for.\\nCommunity will have full control over the blockchain like it should be in a real DPOS.\\n\",\"title\":\"[PROPOSAL]Re-activate staking after snapshot on Luna Classic\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-09T11:13:45.477Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6720577136555\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"6677723369\",\"yes\":\"281002251\"},\"proposal_id\":\"2019\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-26T11:13:45.477Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-02T11:13:45.477Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-26T11:13:45.477Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"To all of us who believe and invest in this project we must not settle for something that could be unfair. That position could be wrong because here we talk about a possible scam, even technical negligence of the project, losing money in a bad investment is understood that it is necessary to accept it but this case is unique and it is not to keep their arms crossed by accepting that they remain with Your money or simply assuming the error that does not correspond to you. I have lost money with bad investments but I repeat this case is unique and gives to talk much more during the time, even there is possible that there is fair compensation or fair resolution so that we can move forward with the project.\\n\\nWe are talking about a coin that looked unbeatable, located in the first places, not a common cryptocurrency that you could buy to try luck .. That is what I want to make clear.\\n\\n If you return what you invested or transfer it to you in another currency but with the value of our investment it would be the most fair.\\n\\nWe are talking about the future of cryptocurrencies, Luna will strongly affect if there is no fair solution that allows people to invest without distrust.\\n\\nWe must be responsible in these types of situations and that there are no way to drift, trust is what this ecosystem would work bireitely.\\n\\nI worry about affected and how they will be compensated, that is what anyone who wants to invest in cryptos would look before. I repeat trust is what makes this ecosystem work.\\n\\nThanks!\",\"title\":\"Saving Terra Luna and cryptocurrencies\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-10T17:57:51.664Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6058432637870\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"2044\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-27T17:57:51.664Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"108000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-04T13:59:24.786Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-28T13:59:24.786Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"The basic idea of this proposal is to help UST repegging mechanism work again and bring back our healthy classic network ecosystem. Which as I know , the current maximum mint rate of Lunc is 200 million per day. However, comparing to the total supply of Lunc which is over 6 trillion, it is relatively small. Which means, the UST repegging system will never work well. So what I'm advising is that adjust the maximum mint rate of Lunc per day to match the total supply, like in 1 percent of total supply or higher. I know this could be implemented by algorithm. But if it's inconvenient, our community could take the job of setting the new parameter of maximum mint rate by using new proposal.\",\"title\":\"Adjust maximum mint rate of Lunc to match current total supply of Lunc\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-12T09:03:09.339Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6077058624764\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"2071\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-29T09:03:09.339Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-05T09:03:09.339Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-29T09:03:09.339Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"Establish fee to 10% on every transaction, then the 50% of the fee goes to burn and the other 50% goes for buying BTC, USDT, USDC... for colletarilizate the UST and achieve the peg again. Every day there are about 300 Billion LUNC moved, the 10% would suppose 30 Billion (15Bn for burn and 15Bn for buying BTC), if the price is $0.00008 this would suppose more than $1.000.000 for peg UST and $1.000.000 more for burn.\",\"title\":\"Burn LUNC + Peg UST (READ PLS)\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-12T09:34:47.067Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6076977283497\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"48675582\"},\"proposal_id\":\"2072\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-29T09:34:47.067Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-05T10:32:04.494Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-29T10:32:04.494Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"I am a simple user of the network so, I like it more or less, I can only be an observer of what happens. "{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"A decentralized economy requires decentralized money.\\n\\nWe propose repegging $UST to 0.00000001 in honor of Satoshi Nakamoto. This, and turning the algo burns back on. (no minting)\\n\\nThis proposal may seem strange, but it will mathematically increase the fidelity and stability of the algo stable mechanics. Instead of 1 $UST equaling 1 USD, 100,000,000 $UST would equal 1 $USD.\\n\\nImmediately UST would be massively printed in order to meet the new demand, and in doing so $LUNC would be burned in equal proportion.\\n\\nThe maths work out.\\n\\nThe ethos of the Luna community has not changed. We believe in decentralization and we believe in UST and Luna Classic.\\n\\nWith risks come plunder, for chaos is a ladder.\\nWe must burn $LUNC.\\n\\n$UST died; she requires resurrection.\",\"title\":\"UST Revival Plan\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-13T02:09:09.010Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6094152976924\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"1063279396\"},\"proposal_id\":\"2860\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-30T02:09:09.010Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-06T03:56:04.606Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-30T03:56:04.606Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"With a circulation supply of around 500 million after the airdrops, the remaining TERRA 2.0 should be burned in order to bring it closer to its pre-attack supply. This will make investors believe that they have a shot at getting their money back. The vesting will only cause big pump and dump at each airdrop. Just the news of burning half the supply would take this to new ATHs and Would attract many new investors specially retail. There would be huge buy pressure and then the price would slowly get back to what it was a month ago.\",\"title\":\"No Vesting, Burn rest of the TERRA 2.0\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-13T13:05:00.989Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"6051520480018\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"1063279396\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"2978\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-05-30T13:05:00.989Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-06T13:05:00.989Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-05-30T13:05:00.989Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"***TDLR: Let’s buy back and burn 6B UST + 6.498T LUNC by paying 130M$ today and 400M LUNC tokens later when price hits 30$. It is possible to buy back and burn for cheap and for UST holders to recover at least 0.60$ per USD***\\n\\nhttps://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-a-financially-viable-lunc-proposal/42722\\n\\n======================================================\\n\\n1. Allow UST holders to recover at least 0.60$ per UST\\n\\n2. Restore network governance\\n\\n3. After the buy back and burn we go back to a 2B supply of LUNC tokens only - no more USTs\\n\\n4. We need to buy tokens back and burn them before doing anything else otherwise the network is not safe to use: https://medium.com/tgradefinance/when-the-tide-goes-out-we-see-who-is-wearing-a-swimming-costume-3ebd5f4d6127\\n\\n5. Without the buy back, Luna Classic will simply be a pump and d_mp token as no builder will want to join since it will be possible to steal assets from the network. So no DEFi, no pools, no borrow lending, no NFTs etc. It is a pitty because there are many Apps readily available to use.\\n\\n6. After the price reaches 30$ UST holders get 200M LUNC token for a total value of 6B$\\n\\n7. After the price reaches 30$ UST whales get 200M LUNC token for a total value of 6B$\\n\\n8. Main advantage of using options is that it lowers the cost of the buy back: At current market price it would cost around 650M to buy all the supply. But then as you buy price will increase so really cost of buy back will be more in the Billions USD. With options, we're buying back at 6B$ but we only need 130M$ today: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Option_(finance)\\n\\n9. We could simply say UST holders get 200M LUNC tokens unlocking when price hits 30$. But with options they could sell before, if someone is willing to buy the options, some UST holders might be happy to sell and move on. With locked tokens..you're locked\\n\\n10. How we redistribute the new supply (600M tokens) is up to the community\\n\\n11. Works with other burns in place (from exchange fees etc.)\\n\",\"title\":\"Financially viable buy and burn / Restore network governance\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-16T04:45:15.014Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5960481771807\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"174123632196\"},\"proposal_id\":\"3001\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-06-02T04:45:15.014Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"1000000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-09T05:21:26.249Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-06-02T05:21:26.249Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.params.v1beta1.ParameterChangeProposal\",\"changes\":[{\"key\":\"SendEnabled\",\"subspace\":\"transfer\",\"value\":\"true\"}],\"description\":\"since the proposal 1299 passed 18days ago, nothing has been changed on IBC , Users' assets are still  trapped  in Osmosis, Please reenable the IBC transactions. \\\"Terra validators disabled IBC as a stop-gap solution to preventing Impermanent Loss on UST and LUNA pools on Osmosis and other IBC DEXs. Unfortunately, this also prevents UST and LUNA from transferring between chains. Currently, about 154.7M UST is stuck in Osmosis alone. This proposal re-enables and unlocks the transfer of UST and LUNA between chains.\\\"\",\"title\":\"(Re)Enable IBC 2\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-16T14:38:02.266Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"5959418492411\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"1201808099171\"},\"proposal_id\":\"3005\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-06-02T14:38:02.266Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-09T14:38:02.266Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-06-02T14:38:02.266Z\"}"
