"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"The community wants to restore the governance, keep the same government, and vote to pass by like before.\\n\\nNOTE: \\n\\nIf you vote \\\"YES\\\", \\nBack to Under the same Do Kwon and his team\\n\\nIf you vote \\\"NO\\\", \\nif you are in \\\"NO\\\" favor, We will rebuild the new governance structure, and please vote at \\\"T1 Community Governance Vote Round - 2\\\" Proposal as well to pick what kind of of government structure you like. \\n\\n\\nForum Link:\\nhttps://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-future-of-lunc-with-new-governance/43346/\\n\\nVoting Rounds & Structure:\\nhttps://global.discourse-cdn.com/terra/original/3X/b/2/b2788b52c4458313fc4622f6a73f550eb48ca271.png\",\"title\":\"T1 Community Governance Vote Round - 1\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-17T04:03:22.730Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"0\",\"no\":\"25511855223\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"0\"},\"proposal_id\":\"3564\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-06-03T04:03:22.730Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-10T04:03:22.730Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-06-03T04:03:22.730Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"This is the final round, for community who like to build new governance structure...  Please make sure to vote Round 1 first before you vote this. \\n\\nYES to (keep the same team), NO to (move on with the new T1 Team)\\n\\nNOTE: \\n\\nIf you vote \\\"YES\\\", \\nRebuild the new governance structure, and keep the same Do Kwon team \\n\\nIf you vote \\\"NO\\\", \\nif you are in \\\"NO\\\" favor, We will rebuild the new governance structure, and move on with the new T1 Team\\n\\nForum Link:\\nhttps://agora.terra.money/t/proposal-future-of-lunc-with-new-governance/43346/\\n\\nVoting Rounds & Structure:\\nhttps://global.discourse-cdn.com/terra/original/3X/b/2/b2788b52c4458313fc4622f6a73f550eb48ca271.png\",\"title\":\"T1 Community Governance Vote Round - 2 \"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-17T04:06:46.717Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"0\",\"no\":\"25510854285\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"1000938\"},\"proposal_id\":\"3565\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-06-03T04:06:46.717Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-10T04:06:46.717Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-06-03T04:06:46.717Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"A Tax & Burn mechanism to be implemented on LUNC to reduce the Total Supply. 1- Removing the link between LUNC and any other token. 2- Removing the minting ability on LUNC. 3- Implement a Tax + Burn mechanism on each buy and sell transaction: (1% burn tax if: Total Supply >= 100B), (0.5% burn tax if: 100B > Total Supply > 10B), (0.1% burn tax if: Total Supply <= 10B). This mechanism should be enabled until the total supply <= 500 Million LUNC, after that, this mechanism is permanently disabled and the total supply can never be changed. The official address from Do Kwon is used for the burning. Details: https://agora.terra.money/t/lunc-recovery-plan-by-a-tax-burn-mechanism-with-each-transaction/43720\",\"title\":\"LUNC recovery plan by a Tax + Burn mechanism with each transaction\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-17T09:24:29.435Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"1063279396\",\"no\":\"0\",\"no_with_veto\":\"0\",\"yes\":\"1050751001985\"},\"proposal_id\":\"3566\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-06-03T09:24:29.435Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"50000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-10T09:24:29.435Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-06-03T09:24:29.435Z\"}"

"{\"content\":{\"@type\":\"/cosmos.gov.v1beta1.TextProposal\",\"description\":\"A Tax  Burn mechanism is to be implemented on LUNC to reduce the Total Supply. Implement a Tax + Burn mechanism on each buy-sell transaction: 1.2% burn tax This mechanism should be true until the total supply = 10 billion LUNC, after that, this mechanism is disabled and the total supply can never be changed. this is to be implemented in all transactions and to be suggested officially by the terra team on all social media that all the exchanges should do the same thing until the condition is met.\\nanother thing is for the official terra team to share on all social media the official burning address. this will help stop the scams.\\nthis is a working process please fill free to share your ideas, this proposal was made because we as a community ear the community and proposal 2975 was with a significant tax, so these numbers are the numbers that the community wants 1.2%. together we can do this please vote\\nis a lot already being done this is just something that will help speed up things for lunc, and maybe bring back investors and dev and validators to the project.\\nhttps://agora.terra.money/t/burn-mechanism-on-transactions-1-2/43759\",\"title\":\"Tax/Burn 1.2% all transactions\"},\"deposit_end_time\":\"2022-06-17T12:36:01.970Z\",\"final_tally_result\":{\"abstain\":\"27371861201018\",\"no\":\"593500100\",\"no_with_veto\":\"667477062611\",\"yes\":\"140094303313533\"},\"proposal_id\":\"3568\",\"status\":\"PROPOSAL_STATUS_PASSED\",\"submit_time\":\"2022-06-03T12:36:01.970Z\",\"total_deposit\":[{\"amount\":\"51000000\",\"denom\":\"uluna\"}],\"voting_end_time\":\"2022-06-10T12:36:01.970Z\",\"voting_start_time\":\"2022-06-03T12:36:01.970Z\"}"
